# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226.2 ::date 2013-06-30T10:29:54 ::snt-type country ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226.3 ::date 2013-06-30T10:30:15 ::snt-type topic ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Narcotics; crime
# ::save-date Sun Jun 30, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226_3.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (n / narcotic)
      :op2 (c / crime))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226.4 ::date 2013-06-30T10:30:32 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt A newspaper report on January 1, 2008 that Iran hanged two convicted drug traffickers in the southeastern city of Zahedan.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226_4.txt
(r / report-01
      :ARG0 (n / newspaper)
      :ARG1 (h / hang-01
            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))
            :ARG1 (p / person :quant 2
                  :ARG1-of (c4 / convict-01)
                  :ARG0-of (t4 / traffic-00
                        :ARG1 (d3 / drug)))
            :location (c3 / city :name (n3 / name :op1 "Zahedan")
                  :location (s / southeast)))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2008 :month 1 :day 1))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226.5 ::date 2013-06-30T10:37:49 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt This brings the number of executions for 2007 to at least 297.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226_5.txt
(b / bring-02
      :ARG0 (t / this)
      :ARG1 (n2 / number
            :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2007)
            :quant-of (e2 / execute-01))
      :ARG4 (a2 / at-least :op1 297))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226.6 ::date 2013-06-30T11:00:48 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt A newspaper report on January 1, 2008 that Iran hanged two convicted drug traffickers in the southeastern city of Zahedan.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226_6.txt

      :ARG0 (n / newspaper)
      :ARG1 (h / hang-01
            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))
            :ARG1 (p / person :quant 2
                  :ARG1-of (c4 / convict-01)
                  :ARG0-of (t4 / traffic-00
                        :ARG1 (d3 / drug)))
            :location (c3 / city :name (n3 / name :op1 "Zahedan")
                  :location (s / southeast)))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2008 :month 1 :day 1))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226.7 ::date 2013-06-30T11:02:43 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt This brings the number of executions for 2007 to at least 297.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226_7.txt
(b / bring-02
      :ARG0 (t / this)
      :ARG1 (n / number
            :quant-of (e / execute-01)
            :time (d / date-entity :year 2007))
      :ARG4 (a2 / at-least :quant 297))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226.8 ::date 2013-06-30T11:04:00 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The hardline Kayhan newspaper said the men were identified as Mehdi Rigi Javan and Naser hedieh sasooli and were hanged in prison on December 31, 2007 for trafficking 59 kilos (130 pounds) of heroin.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226_8.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (n / newspaper :name (n2 / name :op1 "Kayhan")
            :mod (h / hardline))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (i / identify-01
                  :ARG1 (m / man)
                  :ARG2 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (p / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Mehdi" :op2 "Rigi" :op3 "Javan"))
                        :op2 (p2 / person :name (n4 / name :op1 "Naser" :op2 "Hedieh" :op3 "Sasooli"))))
            :op2 (h2 / hang-01
                  :ARG1 m
                  :location (p3 / prison)
                  :time (d / date-entity :month 12 :day 31 :year 2007)
                  :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (t / traffic-00
                              :ARG0 m
                              :ARG1 (h3 / heroin
                                    :quant (m2 / mass-quantity :quant 59
                                          :unit (k / kilogram))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226.9 ::date 2013-06-30T11:08:46 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt An AFP count compiled from local press reports stated that the executions brought the number of people hanged in Iran in 2007 to at least 297.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226_9.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (c / count-01
            :ARG0 (p3 / publication :name (n / name :op1 "AFP"))
            :ARG1-of (c3 / compile-01
                  :source (r / report-01
                        :ARG0 (p / press
                              :mod (l / local)))))
      :ARG1 (b / bring-02
            :ARG0 (e / execute-01)
            :ARG1 (n2 / number
                  :quant-of (p4 / person
                        :ARG1-of (h / hang-01
                              :location (c4 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Iran"))
                              :time (d / date-entity :year 2007))))
            :ARG4 (a2 / at-least :op1 297)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226.10 ::date 2013-06-30T11:12:38 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt This figure well exceeds the 177 convicted criminals executed in 2006 According to Amnesty International.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226_10.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Amnesty" :op2 "International"))
      :ARG1 (e3 / exceed-01
            :ARG0 (f2 / figure
                  :mod (t / this))
            :ARG1 (x / 177
                  :quant-of (c / criminal
                        :ARG1-of (c2 / convict-01)
                        :ARG1-of (e / execute-01
                              :time (d / date-entity :year 2006))))
            :degree (w2 / well)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226.11 ::date 2013-06-30T11:16:41 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Iran is currently the leader in death penalty executions after China.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 12, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226_11.txt
(l / lead-01
      :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))
      :topic (e / execute-01
            :ARG2 (p / penalty
                  :instrument (d / die-01)))
      :time (c / current)
      :degree (l2 / less)
      :compared-to (c3 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "China")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226.12 ::date 2013-06-30T11:18:40 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The number of executions increased in Iran last year amid a campaign that is aimed at improving security in society.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226_12.txt
(i / increase-01
      :ARG1 (n / number
            :quant-of (e / execute-01)
            :location (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran")))
      :time (y / year
            :mod (l / last))
      :prep-amid (c3 / campaign-01
            :ARG1 (i2 / improve-01
                  :ARG1 (s / security
                        :location (s2 / society)))
            :ARG1-of (a / aim-02)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226.13 ::date 2013-06-30T11:22:11 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The campaign has been aimed at arresting drug-traffickers, rapists and those deemed a social menace.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226_13.txt
(a / aim-02
      :ARG0 (c / campaign-01)
      :ARG2 (a2 / arrest-01
            :ARG1 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (t / traffic-00
                              :ARG1 (d / drug)))
                  :op2 (p3 / person
                        :ARG0-of (r / rape-01))
                  :op3 (p / person
                        :ARG0-of (m2 / menace-01
                              :ARG1 (s2 / society)
                              :ARG1-of (d2 / deem-01))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226.14 ::date 2013-06-30T11:45:29 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Dozens of such criminals have been hanged in public.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226_14.txt
(c2 / criminal
      :ARG1-of (i / include-91
            :ARG2 (c3 / criminal
                  :mod (s / such)))
      :quant (m / multiple :op1 12)
      :ARG1-of (h2 / hang-01
            :manner (p2 / public)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226.15 ::date 2013-06-30T11:49:00 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Several executions have occurred in major cities.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 2, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226_15.txt
(e2 / execute-01
      :quant (s2 / several)
      :location (c2 / city
            :mod (m2 / major)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226.16 ::date 2013-06-30T12:24:32 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Capital offences in Iran include murder, rape, armed robbery, serious drug trafficking and adultery.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 2, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226_16.txt
(i / include-01
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (m / murder-01)
            :op2 (r / rape-01)
            :op3 (r2 / rob-01
                  :ARG1-of (a2 / arm-01))
            :op4 (t / traffic-00
                  :ARG1 (d / drug)
                  :mod (s / serious))
            :op5 (a3 / adultery))
      :ARG2 (o / offence
            :mod (c / capital)
            :location (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226.17 ::date 2013-06-30T12:26:35 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Rights groups have accused Iran of employing the death penalty excessively.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 2, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226_17.txt
(a / accuse-01
      :ARG0 (g / group
            :mod (r / right))
      :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))
      :ARG2 (e / employ-02
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (p / penalize-01
                  :instrument (d / die-01))
            :degree (e2 / excessive)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226.18 ::date 2013-06-30T12:28:18 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Authorities say capital punishment is an effective deterrent that is only used after an exhaustive judicial process.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 2, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080101_0226_18.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (a / authority)
      :ARG1 (p / punish-01
            :mod (c / capital)
            :ARG0-of (d / deter-01
                  :mod (e / effective))
            :ARG1-of (u / use-01
                  :mod (o / only)
                  :time (a2 / after
                        :op1 (p2 / process
                              :mod (e2 / exhaustive)
                              :mod (j / justice))))))

            :ARG0 (g3 / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g5 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))))
            :ARG1 (p / person :quant 5
                  :ARG0-of (t / traffic-00
                        :ARG1 (d2 / drug))))

            :quant (n2 / number
                  :ARG1-of (g4 / grow-01))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392.5 ::date 2013-06-30T12:39:06 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The marked increase in executions in Iran since 2006 is defended by the Government as a means of increasing security and criticized by human rights groups as excessive.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392_5.txt
(a2 / and
      :op1 (d2 / defend-01
            :ARG0 (g4 / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g5 / govern-01))
            :ARG1 (i3 / increase-01
                  :ARG1 (e3 / execute-01
                        :location (c4 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran")))
                  :mod (m2 / marked)
                  :time (s2 / since
                        :op1 (d4 / date-entity :year 2006)))
            :prep-as (m3 / means
                  :mod (i4 / increase-01
                        :ARG1 (s3 / security))))
      :op2 (c3 / criticize-01
            :ARG0 (g / group
                  :mod (r2 / right
                        :mod (h2 / human)))
            :ARG1 i3
            :ARG2 (e2 / excessive)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392.6 ::date 2013-06-30T12:44:16 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Government of Iran hanged 5 convicted drug traffickers on 02 January 2008.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392_6.txt
(h / hang-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))))
      :ARG1 (p / person :quant 5
            :ARG1-of (c2 / convict-01)
            :ARG0-of (t / traffic-00
                  :ARG1 (d / drug)))
      :time (d2 / date-entity :day 2 :month 1 :year 2008))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392.7 ::date 2013-06-30T12:46:27 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The 5 hangings were the most recent in an increasing number of executions in Iran.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392_7.txt
(i2 / include-91
      :ARG1 (h2 / hang-01 :quant 5
            :time (r2 / recent
                  :degree (m2 / most)))
      :ARG2 (e2 / execute-01
            :location (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Iran"))
            :quant (n3 / number
                  :ARG1-of (i3 / increase-01))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392.8 ::date 2013-06-30T14:08:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Iran is an Islamic republic.

(r3 / republic
      :domain (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Iran"))
      :mod (r4 / religious-group :name (n4 / name :op1 "Islam")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392.9 ::date 2013-06-30T14:09:31 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (m / media
            :mod (s / state)
            :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392.10 ::date 2013-06-30T14:10:08 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 3 of the 5 drug traffickers were hanged in a public square in the central city of Qom.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392_10.txt
(h2 / hang-01
      :ARG1 (p2 / person :quant 3
            :ARG1-of (i2 / include-91
                  :ARG2 (p3 / person
                        :ARG0-of (t5 / traffic-00 :quant 5
                              :ARG1 (d3 / drug)))))
      :location (s2 / square
            :mod (p4 / public)
            :location (c3 / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Qom")
                  :location (c4 / center))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392.11 ::date 2013-06-30T14:14:18 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 2 of the 5 drug traffickers were hanged in the eastern city of Zahedan.

      :ARG1 (p / person :quant 2
            :ARG1-of (i2 / include-91
                  :ARG2 (p2 / person :quant 5
                        :ARG0-of (t5 / traffic-00
                              :ARG1 (d3 / drug)))))
      :location (c2 / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Zahedan")
            :mod (e2 / east)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392.12 ::date 2013-06-30T14:16:20 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The hangings were the first Iranian executions to be reported in 2008.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392_12.txt
(e / execute-01
      :location (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))
      :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1)
      :ARG1-of (r / report-01
            :time (d / date-entity :year 2008))
      :domain (h / hang-01))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392.13 ::date 2013-06-30T15:32:56 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (a2 / agency :name (n3 / name :op1 "IRNA")
            :mod (n4 / news)
            :mod (o2 / official))
      :ARG1 (h / hang-01
            :ARG1 (p2 / person :quant 3
                  :ARG0-of (t / traffic-00
                        :ARG1 (d / drug)))
            :location (p / province :name (n2 / name :op1 "Qom"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392.17 ::date 2013-06-30T15:37:34 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Local judiciary official Hoda torshizi stated that by implementing God's law the Iranian government is increasing security in society and sending a message that violating the law will not be tolerated in Qom.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392_17.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p3 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Hoda" :op2 "Torshizi")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (o / official
                        :mod (j / justice)))
            :mod (l / local))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (i / increase-01
                  :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))))
                  :ARG1 (s2 / security
                        :location (s3 / society)))
            :op2 (m2 / message-01
                  :ARG0 g
                  :ARG1 (t2 / tolerate-01 :polarity -
                        :ARG1 (v2 / violate-01
                              :ARG1 (l4 / law))
                        :location (p2 / province :name (n5 / name :op1 "Qom"))))
            :instrument (i2 / implement-01
                  :ARG0 g
                  :ARG1 (l3 / law
                        :poss (p / person :name (n4 / name :op1 "God"))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392.18 ::date 2013-06-30T16:48:10 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt State media did not identify the 2 convicts hanged in Zahedan but stated that they had been found guilty of transporting 5.25 kilograms (11.5 pounds) of heroin.

      :ARG1 (i / identify-01 :polarity -
            :ARG0 (m / media
                  :mod (s / state))
            :ARG1 (p / person :quant 2
                  :ARG1-of (c4 / convict-01)
                  :ARG1-of (h3 / hang-01
                        :location (c5 / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Zahedan")))))
      :ARG2 (s2 / state-01
            :ARG0 m
            :ARG1 (f / find-02
                  :ARG1 (g2 / guilty-41
                        :ARG1 p
                        :ARG2 (t2 / transport-01
                              :ARG1 (h / heroin
                                    :quant (m3 / mass-quantity :quant 5.25
                                          :unit (k2 / kilogram))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392.19 ::date 2013-06-30T17:16:08 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Iranian law administers severe penalties for drug trafficking.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 2, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392_19.txt
(a / administer-01
      :ARG0 (l / law
            :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran")))
      :ARG1 (p / penalize-01
            :ARG0 l
            :ARG2 (t2 / traffic-00
                  :ARG1 (d2 / drug))
            :mod (s / severe)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392.21 ::date 2013-06-30T17:25:40 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (f / figure
            :ARG1-of (c / compile-01
                  :ARG0 (p3 / publication :name (n2 / name :op1 "AFP"))
                  :source (r / report-01
                        :ARG0 (p / press))))
      :ARG1 (e / execute-01
            :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))))
            :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :quant (a2 / at-least :op1 297))
            :time (d / date-entity :year 2007)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392.23 ::date 2013-06-30T17:45:43 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (n / number
            :mod (e / execute-01))
      :mod (d / dramatic)
      :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2007)
      :prep-amid (c / campaign-01
            :ARG1-of (a3 / aim-02
                  :ARG2 (i3 / improve-01
                        :ARG1 (s4 / security
                              :location (s5 / society)))
                  :ARG1-of (s / state-01

                              :mod (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran")))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392.24 ::date 2013-06-30T17:52:39 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Iran currently administers the death penalty more than any other country besides China.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080102_0392_24.txt

  :ARG0 (c3 / country
          :name (n3 / name
                  :op1 "Iran"))
  :instrument (d2 / die-01)
  :time (c2 / current)
  :mod (m2 / more
         :compared-to (c / country
                        :mod (o2 / other)
                        :ARG2-of (e / except-00
                                   :ARG1 (c5 / country
                                           :name (n / name
                                                   :op1 "China"))))))

                        :mod (a2 / arm))
                  :op4 (t / traffic-00
                        :ARG1 (d / drug)
                        :mod (s / serious))
                  :op5 (a3 / adultery))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080107_0053.4 ::date 2013-06-27T08:41:57 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (p2 / person

            :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "US")))
      :ARG1 (p / plan-01
            :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))

                  :op1 (d / dispatch-01
                        :ARG0 c2
                        :ARG1 (t / troop)
                        :ARG2 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea")))
                  :op2 (s / secure-02
                        :ARG0 c2
                        :ARG1 (a / arsenal
                              :mod (n4 / nucleus)
                              :poss c3)))
            :condition (i / instability)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080107_0053.5 ::date 2013-06-27T09:04:03 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                                          :ARG1 p2)))
                        :op2 (p3 / person
                              :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (r3 / research-institute :name (n2 / name :op1 "US" :op2 "Institute" :op3 "of" :op4 "Peace"))
                                    :ARG3 (e3 / expert-41
                                          :ARG1 p3)))
                        :op3 (p4 / person
                              :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (r4 / research-institute :name (n3 / name :op1 "Asia" :op2 "Foundation"))
                                    :ARG3 (e4 / expert-41
                                          :ARG1 p4))))))
      :ARG1 (p / plan-01
            :ARG0 (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "China"))
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (d / dispatch-01
                        :ARG1 (t / troop

                                          :mod c3)))
                        :ARG2 (c4 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea")))
                  :op2 (s2 / secure-02

                              :mod (n7 / nucleus))))

                  :topic (d2 / denuclearize-00)
                  :prep-under (m / mechanism
                        :ARG2-of (i2 / involve-01
                              :ARG1 (a / and
                                    :op1 (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))

                                    :op4 (c7 / country :name (n7 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Korea"))
                                    :op5 (c8 / country :name (n8 / name :op1 "Japan"))))
                        :mod (p3 / party :quant 6)))
            :time (c3 / current)
            :ARG1-of (e2 / exchange-01
                  :ARG3 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (a2 / aid-01
                              :mod (e / energy))
                        :op2 (a5 / and
                              :op1 (g / guarantee-01
                                    :ARG1 (s / security))
                              :op2 (g2 / guarantee-01
                                    :mod (d / diplomacy)))))))

                                    :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "US")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.2 ::date 2013-06-28T06:27:35 ::snt-type country ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt France (FR); Iran (IR); United Arab Emirates (UAE)
# ::save-date Fri Jun 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338_2.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "France"))
      :op2 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))
      :op3 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Arab" :op3 "Emirates")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.3 ::date 2013-06-28T06:28:40 ::snt-type topic ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt proliferation; international; business; energy
# ::save-date Fri Jun 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338_3.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (p / proliferate-01)
      :op2 (i / international)
      :op3 (b / business)
      :op4 (e / energy))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.4 ::date 2013-06-28T06:31:12 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt France seeks civilian nuclear energy cooperation with Arab States in order to isolate Iran over nuclear standoff.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338_4.txt
(s / seek-01
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "France"))
      :ARG1 (c2 / cooperate-01
            :ARG1 (s3 / state
                  :mod (e2 / ethnic-group :name (n2 / name :op1 "Arab")))
            :ARG2 (e / energy
                  :mod (n3 / nucleus)
                  :mod (c3 / civilian))
            :purpose (i / isolate-01
                  :ARG1 (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Iran"))
                  :ARG1-of (c5 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (s2 / standoff
                              :mod n3)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.5 ::date 2013-06-28T06:37:57 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 20080114 French President Nicolas Sarkozy visited Saudi Arabia, Qatar and the UAE to discuss exporting French nuclear technology and expertise.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338_5.txt
(v / visit-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Nicolas" :op2 "Sarkozy")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "France"))
                  :ARG2 (p2 / president)))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Saudi" :op2 "Arabia"))
            :op2 (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Qatar"))
            :op3 (c4 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "UAE")))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 14 :month 1 :year 2008)
      :purpose (d2 / discuss-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (e / export-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (t / technology
                              :mod (n6 / nucleus))
                        :op2 (e2 / expertise)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.6 ::date 2013-06-28T06:43:32 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 20080115 Sarkozy will sign a framework accord with the UAE on nuclear energy cooperation.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338_6.txt
(s / sign-02
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Sarkozy"))
      :ARG1 (a / accord
            :mod (f / framework)
            :topic (c2 / cooperate-01
                  :ARG2 (e / energy
                        :mod (n3 / nucleus))))
      :ARG2 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "UAE"))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 15 :month 1 :year 2008))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.7 ::date 2013-06-28T06:50:00 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Sarkozy proposed dispatching French nuclear experts to Saudi Arabia during talks in Riyadh.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338_7.txt
(p / propose-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Sarkozy"))
      :ARG1 (d / dispatch-01
            :ARG1 (p3 / person
                  :ARG1-of (e / expert-41
                        :mod (n2 / nucleus))
                  :mod (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "France")))
            :ARG2 (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Saudi" :op2 "Arabia")))
      :time (t / talk-01
            :location (c3 / city :name (n5 / name :op1 "Riyadh"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.8 ::date 2013-06-28T06:54:56 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The UAE and other Gulf States seek nuclear power in addition to existing oil and gas wealth.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338_8.txt
(s / seek-01
      :ARG0 (a / and
            :op1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "UAE"))
            :op2 (s2 / state
                  :mod (o2 / other)
                  :mod (w / world-region :name (n4 / name :op1 "Gulf"))))
      :ARG1 (a3 / and
            :op1 (p / power
                  :mod (n3 / nucleus))
            :op2 (o3 / oil
                  :ARG1-of (e / exist-01))
            :op3 (w2 / wealth
                  :mod (g3 / gas)
                  :ARG1-of (e2 / exist-01))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.9 ::date 2013-06-28T07:02:11 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt France has previously signed nuclear energy accords with the Arab nations Algeria and Libya and will consider possible nuclear cooperation with Morocco and Egypt.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338_9.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (s / sign-02
            :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "France"))
            :ARG1 (a4 / accord
                  :mod (e / energy
                        :mod n8))
            :ARG2 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (n2 / nation :name (n4 / name :op1 "Algeria"))
                  :op2 (n9 / nation :name (n5 / name :op1 "Libya"))
                  :mod (e2 / ethnic-group :name (n3 / name :op1 "Arab")))
            :time (p2 / previous))
      :op2 (c / consider-02
            :ARG0 c2
            :ARG1 (c3 / cooperate-01
                  :ARG1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (c4 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Morocco"))
                        :op1 (c5 / country :name (n7 / name :op1 "Egypt")))
                  :mod (n8 / nucleus)
                  :mod (p / possible))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.10 ::date 2013-06-28T07:14:30 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "France"))
      :ARG1 (i / industry
            :mod (n2 / nucleus)
            :ARG1-of (c2 / cost-01
                  :ARG2 (m2 / multiple :op1 1000000000
                        :unit (d / dollar)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.11 ::date 2013-06-28T07:32:50 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri Jun 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338_11.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (c / construct-01
            :ARG0 (c2 / company :name (n / name :op1 "Areva"))
            :ARG1 (r / reactor))
      :op2 (m / mine-01
            :ARG0 c2
            :ARG1 (u / uranium))
      :op3 (s / supply-01
            :ARG0 c2
            :ARG1 (f / fuel)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.12 ::date 2013-06-28T07:36:50 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

(o / operate-01
      :ARG0 (c / company :name (n / name :op1 "Electricite" :op2 "de" :op3 "France")
            :mod (u / utility))
      :ARG1 (p / plant
            :mod (n2 / nucleus)))

                  :op2 (t / thing
                        :ARG2-of (p / price-01
                              :ARG1 (e / energy))
                        :mod (h / high))))
      :ARG1 (r / revive-01))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.16 ::date 2013-06-28T07:56:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 20080114 French Oil Corporation total announced an agreement with Areva and utility group Suez concerning the planned construction of 2 modern nuclear power plants in Abu Dhabi.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338_16.txt
(a / announce-01
      :ARG0 (c / corporation :name (n / name :op1 "Total")
            :mod (o / oil)
            :mod (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "France")))
      :ARG1 (a2 / agree-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (p4 / plan-01
                  :ARG1 (c5 / construct-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / plant :quant 2
                              :mod (p3 / power
                                    :mod (n5 / nucleus))
                              :mod (m / modern)
                              :location (c6 / city :name (n6 / name :op1 "Abu" :op2 "Dhabi")))))
            :ARG2 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (c3 / company :name (n3 / name :op1 "Areva"))
                  :op2 (g / group :name (n4 / name :op1 "Suez")
                        :mod (u2 / utility))))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 14 :month 1 :year 2008))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.18 ::date 2013-06-28T08:14:00 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (c / company :name (n / name :op1 "Areva"))
      :ARG1 (d2 / deliver-01
            :ARG1 (r / reactor :quant 2
                  :ARG1-of (c3 / cost-01
                        :ARG2 (m2 / monetary-quantity :quant 8000000000
                              :unit (e / euro))))
            :ARG2 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "China")))
      :time (d / date-entity :month 11 :year 2007))

      :ARG0 (c / company :name (n / name :op1 "Areva"))

            :ARG1 (r / reactor
                  :mod (f / further))
            :location (a / and
                  :op1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "US"))
                  :op2 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Africa")))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.20 ::date 2013-06-28T08:21:55 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG1 (i / interest-01

                  :op1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Vietnam"))
                  :op2 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Indonesia"))
                  :op3 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Chile"))
                  :op4 (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Argentina")))

                  :ARG0 a

                        :mod (n5 / nucleus)
                        :ARG1-of (d / design-01
                              :ARG0 (c5 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "France")))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.23 ::date 2013-06-28T08:43:56 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :mod (c / civilian)))

                        :mod (c2 / confidence)
                        :ARG1-of (f2 / forge-02

                                    :op1 (c3 / country
                                          :location (w3 / world-region :name (n4 / name :op1 "West")))
                                    :op2 (w / world
                                          :mod (r / religious-group :name (n3 / name :op1 "Islam"))))
                              :ARG2-of (o / obligate-01
                                    :ARG1 c3))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.24 ::date 2013-07-03T08:04:17 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

            :ARG0 (d / deny-01
                  :ARG1 (p2 / power
                        :mod (n6 / nucleus)
                        :mod (c4 / civilian))
                  :ARG2 (n / nation
                        :mod (e / ethnic-group :name (n2 / name :op1 "Arab"))))
            :ARG1 (c5 / credence)
            :ARG2 (a / argument
                  :poss (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Iran")))
            :ARG1-of (b / base-02
                  :ARG2 e)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.26 ::date 2013-06-28T09:15:30 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt France's strategy depends on highlighting Iran's error in defying the international community over the nuclear issue.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338_26.txt
(d / depend-01
      :ARG0 (s / strategy
            :poss (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "France")))
      :ARG1 (h / highlight-01
            :ARG1 (e / err-01
                  :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))
                  :manner (d2 / defy-01
                        :ARG0 c2
                        :ARG1 (c3 / community
                              :mod (i / international))
                        :ARG1-of (c4 / cause-01
                              :ARG0 (i2 / issue
                                    :mod (n3 / nucleus)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.27 ::date 2013-06-28T09:20:36 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Non-nuclear countries will be difficult to mobilize against Iran if they are treated the same way as Iran.
# ::save-date Sat Jul 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338_27.txt
(d / difficult
      :domain (m / mobilize-01
            :ARG1 (c / country
                  :mod (n / nucleus :polarity -))
            :prep-against (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran")))
      :condition (t / treat-01
            :ARG1 c
            :ARG2 (w / way
                  :ARG1-of (s2 / same-41
                        :ARG2 (t2 / treat-01
                              :ARG1 c2
                              :ARG2 (w2 / way))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.28 ::date 2013-07-04T06:07:10 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Some are concerned over the potential risk of supplying nuclear technology to Arab States because the region is unstable and dominated by authoritarian regimes and Islamic extremism.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338_28.txt
(c2 / concern-01
      :ARG0 (r / risk-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / supply-01
                  :ARG1 (t / technology
                        :mod (n4 / nucleus))
                  :ARG2 (s4 / state
                        :mod (e2 / ethnic-group :name (n5 / name :op1 "Arab"))))
            :mod (p / potential))
      :ARG1 (s / some)
      :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (s3 / stable :polarity -
                        :domain (r4 / region))
                  :op2 (d / dominate-01
                        :ARG0 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (r3 / regime
                                    :mod (a2 / authoritarian))
                              :op2 (e / extremism
                                    :mod (r5 / religious-group :name (n / name :op1 "Islam"))))
                        :ARG1 r4))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.29 ::date 2013-06-30T02:26:46 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt German energy minister Gernot Erler stated in response to France's decision to provide nuclear technology to Libya that the risk of proliferation goes up with every country that uses nuclear energy.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338_29.txt
(r2 / respond-01
      :ARG0 (p3 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Gernot" :op2 "Erler")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Germany"))
                  :ARG2 (m / minister
                        :mod (e / energy))))
      :ARG1 (d / decide-01
            :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "France"))
            :ARG1 (p / provide-01
                  :ARG1 (t / technology
                        :mod (n4 / nucleus))
                  :ARG2 (c3 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Libya"))))
      :ARG2 (s / state-01
            :ARG0 p3
            :ARG1 (g / go-01
                  :ARG1 (r / risk-01
                        :ARG0 (c4 / country
                              :mod (e2 / every)
                              :ARG0-of (u2 / use-01
                                    :ARG1 (e3 / energy
                                          :mod n4)))
                        :ARG1 (p2 / proliferate-01))
                  :direction (u / up))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.30 ::date 2013-06-30T11:48:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :op1 (r / right
                              :mod (h / human))
                        :op2 (e2 / environment)
                        :op3 (s3 / security
                              :mod (i / international))))
            :ARG0-of (s2 / suffice-01 :polarity -)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.31 ::date 2013-06-30T12:07:39 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Jean-Pierre maulny of France's Institute for International and Strategic Relations (IRIS) stated that associated with the spread of civilian nuclear energy in a sensitive region is the risk of military nuclear programs unless control is absolute.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338_31.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Jean-Pierre" :op2 "Maulny")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (r / research-institute :name (n2 / name :op1 "Institute" :op2 "for" :op3 "International" :op4 "and" :op5 "Strategic" :op6 "Relations")
                        :mod (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "France")))))
      :ARG1 (a / associate-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / spread-02
                  :ARG1 (e / energy
                        :mod (n4 / nucleus)
                        :mod (c3 / civilian))
                  :location (r2 / region
                        :mod (s3 / sensitive)))
            :ARG2 (r3 / risk-01
                  :topic (p2 / program
                        :mod (n5 / nucleus)
                        :mod (m / military))
                  :condition (c2 / control-01 :polarity -
                        :degree (a2 / absolute)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080114_0338.32 ::date 2013-06-30T12:29:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :mod (c / covert)

                                    :ARG1-of (t2 / transfer-01
                                          :ARG3 (c2 / country
                                                :example (c4 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Pakistan"))))))))
            :ARG1 (p3 / proliferate-01
                  :mod (p4 / potential)

                        :ARG2 (a2 / aid-01

                              :mod (c5 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "France")))))))

                        :ARG0 (r / refuse-01

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080123_0458.19 ::date 2013-07-08T00:54:11 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Saeed Jalili was questioned by reporters after the European Parliament Foreign Affairs Committee meeting and did not comment on the moves to bring a new United Nations resolution against Iran and stated only that sending the Iran nuclear dossier to the Security Council was illegal.
# ::save-date Fri Jul 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080123_0458_19.txt

      :op1 (q / question-01
            :ARG0 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (r / report-01))
            :ARG2 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Saeed" :op2 "Jalili"))
            :time (a2 / after
                  :op1 (m / meet-03
                        :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "European" :op2 "Parliament" :op3 "Foreign" :op4 "Affairs" :op5 "Committee")))))
      :op2 (c3 / comment-01 :polarity -
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (m2 / move-02
                  :ARG1 (b / bring-01
                        :ARG1 (r2 / resolution
                              :mod (o2 / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations"))
                              :mod (n7 / new)
                              :prep-against (c / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Iran"))))))
      :op3 (s / state-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (l / legal :polarity -
                  :domain (s2 / send-01
                        :ARG1 (d / dossier
                              :mod (n8 / nucleus)
                              :mod c)
                        :ARG2 (o3 / organization :name (n6 / name :op1 "Security" :op2 "Council"))))
            :mod (o4 / only)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080123_0458.20 ::date 2013-07-08T01:18:50 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon Sep 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080123_0458_20.txt
(p2 / play-07
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n7 / name :op1 "Mahmoud" :op2 "Ahmadinejad")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))
                  :ARG2 (p3 / president)))
      :ARG1 (i / impact-01
            :ARG0 (r / resolution
                  :mod (a / any)
                  :time (f / future)
                  :mod (o / organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "Security" :op2 "Council")))
            :ARG1 (p4 / program-01
                  :mod (c4 / controversial)
                  :mod (n8 / nucleus)
                  :mod c))
      :time (a2 / after
            :op1 (s / state-01

                        :mod (w / world))
                  :ARG1 (a3 / agree-01
                        :ARG0 p5

                              :mod (o2 / organization :name (n6 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations"))
                              :mod (n9 / new)))))
      :location (c2 / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Tehran")))

                        :ARG0 (t / try-01

                                          :topic (t2 / technology

                        :op1 (d2 / distance-quantity :quant 2800
                              :unit (k2 / kilometer))
                        :op2 (d3 / distance-quantity :quant 1740
                              :unit (m / mile))))))

            :mod (j / joint))
      :mod (a / also))

      :ARG0 (a / accord)
      :ARG1 (p / possible

                              :ARG0 (m2 / military))
                        :poss (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "India")))
                  :ARG1 (r4 / research-institute :name (n3 / name :op1 "Institute" :op2 "for" :op3 "Strategic" :op4 "Studies")
                        :ARG1-of (r3 / run-01
                              :ARG0 (s / state))
                        :poss (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Pakistan")))
                  :mod (r / regular))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080204_0525.9 ::date 2013-06-30T12:03:49 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (a / accord)
      :ARG1 (s2 / send-02

                  :op2 (p / public-institution :name (n2 / name :op1 "Institute" :op2 "for" :op3 "Strategic" :op4 "Studies")
                        :ARG1-of (r2 / run-01
                              :ARG0 (s3 / state))
                        :poss (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Pakistan"))))
            :ARG1 (p4 / person
                  :ARG1-of (e / expert-41))
            :ARG2 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (p2 / participate-01
                        :ARG0 p4
                        :ARG1 (w / workshop
                              :ARG1-of (s4 / sponsor-01
                                    :ARG0 (s5 / state)))
                        :location (a4 / and
                              :op1 (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "India"))
                              :op2 c))

                        :ARG0 p4
                        :ARG2 (p3 / project
                              :mod (r3 / research)
                              :mod (m2 / military)
                              :mod (j / joint))
                        :mod (l / late
                              :degree (m / more))))))

                            :poss c2))))

      :ARG0 (p / paper)

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080212_0514.7 ::date 2013-07-08T10:42:59 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Association of Banks in Singapore, the Singapore Government and the S. Rajaratnam School of International Studies launched the consortium in Singapore with plans for later involvement of other countries in the Asia Pacific region.
# ::save-date Sun Jul 14, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080212_0514_7.txt
(a2 / and
  :op1 (l / launch-01
         :ARG0 (a / and
                 :op1 (o / organization
                        :name (n / name
                                :op1 "Association"
                                :op2 "of"
                                :op3 "Banks")
                        :location (c / country
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                            :op1 "Singapore")))
                 :op2 (g / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                                   :ARG1 c))
                 :op3 (s / school
                        :name (n4 / name
                                :op1 "S."
                                :op2 "Rajaratnam"
                                :op3 "School"
                                :op4 "of"
                                :op5 "International"
                                :op6 "Studies")))
         :ARG1 (c4 / consortium)
         :location c)
  :op2 (p / plan-01
         :ARG0 a
         :ARG1 (i / involve-01
                 :ARG1 (c3 / country
                         :mod (o3 / other)
                         :location (r / region
                                     :name (n6 / name
                                             :op1 "Asia"
                                             :op2 "Pacific")))
                 :time (l2 / late
                         :degree (m / more)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080212_0514.8 ::date 2013-07-08T10:53:04 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Consortium aims to strengthen cooperation between banks, government agencies and academia to cut off funding for extremist groups.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080212_0514_8.txt
(a / aim-01
  :ARG0 (c3 / consortium)
  :ARG1 (s / strengthen-01
          :ARG1 (c / cooperate-01
                  :ARG0 (a5 / and
                          :op1 (b / bank)
                          :op2 (a3 / agency
                                 :mod (g / government-organization
                                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01)))
                          :op3 (a4 / academia))
                  :ARG2 (c2 / cut-04
                          :ARG1 (f / fund-01
                                  :ARG1 (g3 / group
                                          :mod (e / extremism)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080212_0514.9 ::date 2013-07-08T11:00:56 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Rohan" :op2 "Gunaratna")
            :ARG0-of (h / head-01
                  :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "International" :op2 "Centre" :op3 "for" :op4 "Political" :op5 "Violence" :op6 "and" :op7 "Terrorism" :op8 "Research")
                        :ARG1-of (b / base-01
                              :location (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Singapore")))))
            :ARG0-of (a / analyze-01
                  :ARG1 (t / terrorism)))
      :ARG1 (s2 / seek-01
            :ARG0 (c2 / consortium)
            :ARG1 (m / make-02
                  :ARG1 (d2 / difficult
                        :domain (t2 / transfer-01
                              :ARG1 (m2 / money)
                              :ARG2 (g / group
                                    :mod (e / extremism)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080212_0514.10 ::date 2013-07-08T11:16:49 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Gunaratna spoke to reporters on the sidelines of a closed-door Seminar on countering the financing of terrorism and stated militant groups including the Abu Sayyaf and Jemaah Islamiyah (JI) move between 2 and 3 million US dollars per month to fund terrorist activities in Southeast Asia.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080212_0514_10.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (s / speak-01
            :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Gunaratna"))
            :ARG2 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (r / report-01))
            :location (s2 / sideline
                  :poss (s3 / seminar
                        :mod (d2 / door
                              :ARG1-of (c2 / close-01))
                        :topic (c / counter-01
                              :ARG1 (f / finance-01
                                    :ARG1 (t / terrorism))))))
      :op2 (s4 / state-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (m / move-01
                  :ARG0 (g / group
                        :ARG0-of (i / include-01
                              :ARG1 (a2 / and
                                    :op1 (c4 / criminal-organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "Abu" :op2 "Sayyaf"))
                                    :op2 (c5 / criminal-organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "Jemaah" :op2 "Islamiyah"))))
                        :mod (m2 / militant))
                  :ARG1 (r2 / rate-entity-91
                        :ARG1 (b / between
                              :op1 (m3 / monetary-quantity :quant 2000000
                                    :unit (d / dollar
                                          :mod (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "US"))))
                              :op2 (m4 / monetary-quantity :quant 3000000
                                    :unit d))
                        :ARG2 (t3 / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                              :unit (m5 / month)))
                  :ARG2 (f2 / fund-01
                        :ARG1 (a3 / activity
                              :mod (t2 / terrorism))
                        :location (w / world-region :name (n5 / name :op1 "Southeast" :op2 "Asia"))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080212_0514.11 ::date 2013-07-08T11:51:25 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Gunaratna"))

          :ARG1 (e / estimate-01)
          :ARG2 (g / gather-01
                  :ARG1 (d / data)
                  :source (a / and
                            :op1 (d2 / debrief-00
                                   :ARG1 (m / militant
                                           :ARG1-of (c / capture-01)))
                            :op2 (e2 / examine-01
                                   :ARG1 (d3 / document
                                           :ARG1-of (s2 / seize-01
                                                      :ARG2 (c2 / camp
                                                              :location-of (t2 / train-01
                                                                             :mod m)))))
                            :op3 (r / report-01
                                   :ARG0 (i / intelligence))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080212_0514.12 ::date 2013-07-08T12:13:06 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :op3 (a2 / as-well
                        :op1 (c6 / criminal-organization :name (n5 / name :op1 "JI")

                                    :op2 (c2 / country :name (n9 / name :op1 "Indonesia")))))
                  :mod (o / operate-01
                        :ARG0 (b / both)
                        :location (s2 / south
                              :part-of (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Philippines")))))
            :ARG2 (g6 / group
                  :ARG1-of (i2 / involve-01
                        :ARG2 (t / transfer-01
                              :ARG1 (f / fund))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080212_0514.13 ::date 2013-07-08T12:49:12 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

  :ARG0 (a / authority)
  :ARG1 (c2 / criminal-organization
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "JI"))
  :ARG2 (a2 / and
          :op1 (b3 / bomb-01
                 :ARG0-of (k / kill-01
                            :ARG1 (i2 / include-91
                                    :ARG1 (f / foreigner
                                            :mod (m / most))
                                    :ARG2 (p / person
                                            :quant 202))
                            :location (i / island
                                        :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "Bali")
                                        :mod (r / resort)
                                        :mod (c / country
                                               :name (n3 / name
                                                       :op1 "Indonesia")))
                            :time (d / date-entity
                                    :year 2002)))
          :op2 (a3 / attack-01
                 :mod (o / other)
                 :quant (s / series))))

                  :mod (m / militant))
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (s2 / system
                        :mod (b / banking))
                  :op2 (t / transfer-01
                        :ARG1 (m2 / money)
                        :mod (f / formal :polarity -))
                  :op3 (c / courier
                        :ARG0-of (c4 / carry-01
                              :ARG1 (b2 / bag
                                    :ARG1-of (f2 / fill-01
                                          :ARG2 (c3 / cash))))))
            :ARG2 (t2 / transfer-01
                  :ARG0 g
                  :ARG1 (f3 / fund))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135.4 ::date 2013-06-29T21:51:16 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Sun Jul 7, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135_4.txt
(u / urge-01
      :ARG0 (a / agency :name (n / name :op1 "International" :op2 "Atomic" :op3 "Energy" :op4 "Agency"))
      :ARG1 (c / clear-04
            :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))
            :ARG1 (a2 / allege-01
                  :ARG1 (p / program
                        :topic (w / weapon
                              :mod (n3 / nucleus))
                        :mod (c3 / covert)
                        :poss c2)))
      :ARG1-of (c4 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (i / impose-01
                  :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations" :op3 "Security" :op4 "Council"))
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG2-of (s / sanction-02
                              :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                                    :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                                          :ARG1 c2)))
                        :mod (n6 / new))
                  :ARG2 g)))

      :mod (a2 / atom)
      :poss (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations"))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135.7 ::date 2013-06-29T22:21:31 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Mohammed ElBaradei stated that Mohammed ElBaradei urged Iran to be as active and as cooperative as possible in working with the International Atomic Energy Agency to clarify the allegations of Iran's covert nuclear weapons program and that the allegations are of serious concern.
# ::save-date Sun Jul 7, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135_7.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Mohammed" :op2 "ElBaradei"))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (u / urge-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (a3 / active
                              :domain (c3 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))
                              :topic (w / work-01
                                    :ARG0 c3
                                    :ARG3 (a4 / agency :name (n3 / name :op1 "International" :op2 "Atomic" :op3 "Energy" :op4 "Agency"))))
                        :op2 (c2 / cooperate-01
                              :ARG0 c3
                              :ARG2 w
                              :topic w)
                        :op3 (c4 / clarify-01
                              :ARG0 p
                              :ARG1 (a5 / allege-01
                                    :ARG1 (p3 / program
                                          :topic (w2 / weapon
                                                :mod (n4 / nucleus))
                                          :mod (c5 / covert)
                                          :poss c3)))
                        :degree (p2 / possible
                              :op1 a2)))
            :op2 (c / concern-01
                  :ARG0 a5
                  :mod (s2 / serious))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135.9 ::date 2013-06-29T22:42:31 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt On the first day of the 35-member board of governors meeting of the International Atomic Energy Agency's regular March meeting Mohammed ElBaradei stated that Iran's active cooperation is necessary to enable the International Atomic Energy Agency to make a determination about the nature and scope of all of Iran's past nuclear activities.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135_9.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Mohammed" :op2 "ElBaradei"))
      :ARG1 (n2 / need-01
            :ARG1 (c / cooperate-01
                  :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Iran"))
                  :mod (a / active))
            :purpose (e / enable-01
                  :ARG1 (d4 / determine-01
                        :ARG0 a2
                        :ARG1 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (n5 / nature
                                    :mod (a4 / activity
                                          :quant (a5 / all)
                                          :mod (n6 / nucleus)
                                          :mod (p2 / past)
                                          :poss c2))
                              :op2 (s2 / scope
                                    :mod a4)))
                  :ARG2 (a2 / agency :name (n4 / name :op1 "International" :op2 "Atomic" :op3 "Energy" :op4 "Agency"))))
      :time (d2 / day
            :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1
                  :range (m2 / meet-03
                        :ARG0 (p5 / person :quant 35
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (o2 / organization :name (n7 / name :op1 "Board" :op2 "of" :op3 "Governors")
                                          :consist-of (p4 / person))
                                    :ARG2 (m4 / member)))
                        :subevent-of (m / meet-03
                              :ARG0 a2
                              :frequency (r / regular)
                              :time (d3 / date-entity :month 3))))))

                        :mod (d / disarm-01

            :mod m)

            :ARG0 (o3 / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "International" :op2 "Atomic" :op3 "Energy" :op4 "Agency's" :op5 "Board" :op6 "of" :op7 "Governors"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135.12 ::date 2013-06-29T23:41:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Iranian issues were expected to dominate the International Atomic Energy Agency's board of governors meeting proceedings following the release of Mohammed ElBaradei's latest report on the Iranian government's disputed nuclear weapons ambitions.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135_12.txt
(e / expect-01
  :ARG1 (d / dominate-01
          :ARG0 (i / issue
                  :mod (c / country
                         :name (n / name
                                 :op1 "Iran")))
          :ARG1 (p / proceeding
                  :mod (m / meet-03
                         :ARG0 (o / organization
                                 :name (n2 / name
                                         :op1 "International"
                                         :op2 "Atomic"
                                         :op3 "Energy"
                                         :op4 "Agency's"
                                         :op5 "Board"
                                         :op6 "of"
                                         :op7 "Governors")))))
  :ARG1-of (f / follow-01
             :ARG2 (r / release-01
                     :ARG1 (r2 / report-01
                             :ARG0 (p3 / person
                                     :name (n3 / name
                                             :op1 "Mohammed"
                                             :op2 "ElBaradei"))
                             :ARG1 (a2 / ambition
                                     :mod (w / weapon
                                            :mod (n4 / nucleus))
                                     :ARG2-of (d2 / dispute-01)
                                     :poss (g2 / government-organization
                                             :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01
                                                        :ARG1 c)))
                             :time (l / late
                                     :degree (m2 / most))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135.14 ::date 2013-06-30T00:10:06 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Diplomats stated that moves were underway to draft a resolution to press the Iranian Government to address key concerns about alleged weaponisation studies.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135_14.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (d / diplomat)))
      :ARG1 (u / underway
            :domain (m / move-01)
            :purpose (d2 / draft-01
                  :ARG0 m
                  :ARG1 r
                  :purpose (p / press-01
                        :ARG0 (r / resolution)
                        :ARG1 (a / address-02
                              :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                                    :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                                          :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))))
                              :ARG1 (c2 / concern-01
                                    :ARG0 (s2 / study-01
                                          :ARG1 (w / weaponize-01)
                                          :ARG1-of (a2 / allege-01))
                                    :mod (k / key)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135.15 ::date 2013-06-30T00:13:01 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt If resolution currently underway is adopted then the resolution would be the first such resolution in 2 years.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 2, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135_15.txt
(h / have-condition-91
      :ARG1 (r / resolution
            :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1
                  :range (t / temporal-quantity :quant 2
                        :unit (y / year)))
            :mod (s / such))
      :ARG2 (a / adopt-01
            :ARG1 (r2 / resolution
                  :mod (u / underway
                        :time (c / current)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135.16 ::date 2013-06-30T00:36:55 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt In New York on 080303 the United Nations Security Council voted overwhelmingly to increase United Nations sanctions on Iran due to Iran's refusal to suspend Iran's sensitive nuclear fuel work.
# ::save-date Sun Jul 7, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135_16.txt
(v / vote-01
      :ARG0 (o2 / organization :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations" :op3 "Security" :op4 "Council"))
      :ARG1 (i / increase-01
            :ARG0 (o / organization)
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :ARG2-of (s / sanction-02
                        :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Iran"))))
            :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (r / refuse-01
                        :ARG0 c2
                        :ARG1 (s2 / suspend-01
                              :ARG0 c2
                              :ARG1 (w / work-01
                                    :ARG0 c2
                                    :ARG1 (f / fuel
                                          :mod (n5 / nucleus))
                                    :mod (s3 / sensitive))))))
      :location (c / city :name (n3 / name :op1 "New" :op2 "York"))
      :time (d / date-entity :month 3 :day 3 :year 2008)
      :ARG2-of (o3 / overwhelm-01))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135.17 ::date 2013-06-30T00:46:50 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Western countries fear the intent of Iran's sensitive nuclear fuel work is to develop nuclear weapons.
# ::save-date Sun Jul 7, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135_17.txt
(f / fear-01
      :ARG0 (c / country
            :location (w / world-region :name (n4 / name :op1 "West")))
      :ARG1 (i / intend-01
            :ARG1 (d / develop-02
                  :ARG0 c2
                  :ARG1 (w3 / weapon
                        :mod (n3 / nucleus)))
            :ARG2 (w2 / work-01
                  :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))
                  :ARG1 (f2 / fuel
                        :mod (n2 / nucleus))
                  :mod (s / sensitive))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135.18 ::date 2013-06-30T00:54:49 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt A resolution sponsored by Britain, France and Germany gained the backing of 14 of the United Nations Security Council's 15 members.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135_18.txt
(g / gain-02
      :ARG0 (r / resolution
            :ARG1-of (s / sponsor-01
                  :ARG0 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Britain"))
                        :op2 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "France"))
                        :op3 (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Germany")))))
      :ARG1 (b / back-01
            :ARG0 (c4 / country :quant 14
                  :ARG1-of (i / include-91
                        :ARG2 (c5 / country :quant 15
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations" :op3 "Security" :op4 "Council"))
                                    :ARG2 (m / member)))))
            :ARG1 r))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135.19 ::date 2013-06-30T09:14:14 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-08 ::preferred
# ::snt Indonesia abstained from voting on the resolution.

(a / abstain-01
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Indonesia"))
      :ARG1 (v / vote-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (r / resolution)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135.20 ::date 2013-06-30T01:02:59 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135_20.txt

  :ARG1 (v / vote-01
          :ARG1 (i / increase-01
                  :ARG1 (s / sanction-02
                          :ARG0 (c / country
                                  :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "United"
                                          :op2 "Nations"))
                          :ARG1 (c2 / country
                                  :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Iran"))))
          :time (d / date-entity
                  :month 3
                  :day 1
                  :year 2008)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135.21 ::date 2013-06-30T01:06:14 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The vote to increase the United Nations sanctions on Iran was delayed until 080303 to give the sponsors time to try to win over 4 reticent United Nations Security Council members.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135_21.txt
(d / delay-01
      :ARG1 (v / vote-01
            :ARG1 (i / increase-01
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG2-of (s / sanction-02
                              :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations"))
                              :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))))))
      :time (u / until
            :op1 (d2 / date-entity :month 3 :day 3 :year 2008))
      :purpose (g / give-01
            :ARG1 (t2 / time)
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (s2 / sponsor-01))
            :purpose (t3 / try-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (w / win-02
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 (c2 / country :quant 4
                              :mod (r / reticent)
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (o2 / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations" :op3 "Security" :op4 "Council"))
                                    :ARG2 (m / member)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135.22 ::date 2013-06-30T01:18:00 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :mod (r / reticent)
      :domain (a / and
            :op1 (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Indonesia"))
            :op2 (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Libya"))
            :op3 (c3 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Africa"))
            :op4 (c4 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Vietnam")))
      :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
            :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations" :op3 "Security" :op4 "Council"))
            :ARG2 (m / member)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135.23 ::date 2013-06-30T01:21:14 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Sun Jul 7, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135_23.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (i / intelligence
            :time (r / recent)
            :ARG1-of (p / present-01
                  :ARG2 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "International" :op2 "Atomic" :op3 "Energy" :op4 "Agency" :op5 "Board"))
                  :time (w / week)
                  :mod (l / last)))
      :ARG1 (i2 / involve-01
            :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))))
            :ARG2 (r2 / research-01
                  :ARG1 (m / military)
                  :ARG0-of (i3 / indicate-01
                        :ARG1 (d / develop-02
                              :ARG1 (w2 / weapon
                                    :mod (c2 / convention :polarity -)))))
            :ARG1-of (a2 / allege-01)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135.24 ::date 2013-06-30T01:41:11 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Intelligence presented to the International Atomic Energy Agency Board was derived from a number of different independent sources and covered a uranium conversion project, high explosives tests and a missile re-entry vehicle modified to accommodate a possible nuclear warhead.
# ::save-date Sun Jul 7, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135_24.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (d / derive-01
            :ARG1 (i / intelligence
                  :ARG1-of (p / present-01
                        :ARG2 (b / board
                              :mod (a2 / agency :name (n / name :op1 "International" :op2 "Atomic" :op3 "Energy" :op4 "Agency")))))
            :ARG2 (s2 / source
                  :quant (n2 / number
                        :ARG0-of (d2 / depend-01 :polarity -)
                        :ARG1-of (d3 / differ-02))))
      :op2 (c / cover-01
            :ARG0 i
            :ARG1 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (p2 / project
                        :topic (c2 / convert-01
                              :ARG1 (u / uranium)))
                  :op2 (t / test-01
                        :ARG1 (e / explosive
                              :mod (h / high)))
                  :op3 (v / vehicle
                        :ARG1-of (m / modify-01
                              :ARG2 (a4 / accommodate-01
                                    :ARG1 (w / warhead
                                          :mod (n3 / nucleus)
                                          :mod (p3 / possible))))
                        :instrument-of (r / re-enter-01
                              :ARG0 (m2 / missile))))))

                        :mod (n3 / nucleus))

                        :op1 (d / date-entity :year 2003

      :op2 (d2 / dismiss-01
            :ARG0 g
            :ARG1 (i2 / intelligence
                  :ARG1-of (u / use-01
                        :ARG2 (s / support-01
                              :ARG1 a)))
            :ARG2 (f / fake-01)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135.27 ::date 2013-06-30T02:25:23 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The International Atomic Energy Agency insists that the Iranian government's simple denials of the Intelligence presented to the International Atomic Energy Agency Board are not good enough to allay Western countries suspicions.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135_27.txt
(i / insist-01
  :ARG0 (a / agency
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "International"
                  :op2 "Atomic"
                  :op3 "Energy"
                  :op4 "Agency"))
  :ARG1 (d / deny-01
          :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                             :ARG1 (c / country
                                     :name (n2 / name
                                             :op1 "Iran"))))
          :ARG1 (i2 / intelligence)
          :mod (s / simple)
          :ARG1-of (p / present-01
                     :ARG2 (o / organization
                             :name (n3 / name
                                     :op1 "International"
                                     :op2 "Atomic"
                                     :op3 "Energy"
                                     :op4 "Agency"
                                     :op5 "Board")))
          :ARG1-of (g3 / good-41
                     :ARG2 (a2 / allay-01
                             :ARG0 a
                             :ARG1 (t / thing
                                     :ARG1-of (s2 / suspect-01
                                                :ARG0 (c2 / country
                                                        :location (w / world-region
                                                                    :name (n4 / name
                                                                            :op1 "West"))))))
                     :ARG0-of (s3 / suffice-01
                                :polarity -))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135.28 ::date 2013-06-30T03:32:57 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Mohammed" :op2 "ElBaradei"))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (c / continue-01
                  :ARG0 (c3 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))
                  :ARG1 (m / maintain-01
                        :ARG0 c3
                        :ARG1 (o2 / or
                              :op1 (r / relate-01
                                    :ARG1 (s2 / study-01
                                          :ARG1 (w / weaponize-01)
                                          :mod (t / this)
                                          :ARG1-of (a3 / allege-01))
                                    :ARG2 (w2 / weapon
                                          :mod (c4 / convention)
                                          :mod (o / only)))
                              :op2 (f / fabricate-01
                                    :ARG1 s2))))
            :op2 (c2 / commence-01 :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (e / examine-01
                        :ARG1 (i / issue
                              :mod s2)
                        :mod (c5 / complete)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135.29 ::date 2013-06-30T03:43:34 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
