# ::save-date Sun Jul 7, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135_29.txt

      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Mohammed" :op2 "ElBaradei"))
      :ARG1 (r / regret-01
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (s2 / suspend-01 :polarity -
                        :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))
                        :ARG1 (a2 / activity
                              :poss c2
                              :mod (e / enrich-01
                                    :ARG1 (n3 / nucleus))
                              :ARG1-of (a4 / align-01
                                    :ARG2 (r2 / resolution
                                          :mod (o / organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations" :op3 "Security" :op4 "Council"))))))
                  :op2 (c / continue-01
                        :ARG0 c2
                        :ARG1 (w / work-01
                              :ARG0 c2
                              :ARG1 (c3 / centrifuge
                                    :ARG1-of (a3 / advance-01
                                          :degree (m / more))
                                    :ARG0-of (e2 / enrich-01
                                          :ARG1 (u / uranium))))))))

                  :mod (n3 / nucleus
                         :mod (s3 / strict
                                :polarity -)))

                     :ARG1 (f2 / fall-01
                             :ARG1 s2

                                     :poss (a3 / agency
                                             :name (n4 / name

                                                     :op2 "Atomic"
                                                     :op3 "Energy"
                                                     :op4 "Agency")))
                             :polarity -))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135.36 ::date 2013-06-30T04:37:55 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Mohammad Saeedi stated that any resolution by the United Nations Security Council would complicate and make a resolution of the long-running standoff between the Iranian government and the international community more difficult.
# ::save-date Mon Jul 8, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0135_36.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Mohammad" :op2 "Saeedi"))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (c / complicate-01
                  :ARG0 (r / resolution
                        :mod (a2 / any)
                        :mod (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations" :op3 "Security" :op4 "Council"))))
            :op2 (m / make-02
                  :ARG1 (d / difficult
                        :degree (m2 / more)
                        :domain (r2 / resolve-01
                              :ARG1 (s2 / standoff
                                    :mod (b / between
                                          :op1 (g / government-organization

                                                      :ARG1 (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Iran"))))
                                          :op2 (c2 / community
                                                :mod (i / international)))
                                    :duration (l / long)))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0316.7 ::date 2013-06-30T05:08:04 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt A new UN Security Council resolution against Iran's nuclear activities would be irrational and unlawful and complicate the standoff with Western nations rather than promoting resolution of the issue.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0316_7.txt

  :op1 (r / rational
         :polarity -
         :domain (r3 / resolution
                   :mod (n / new)
                   :prep-against (a2 / activity
                                   :mod (n4 / nucleus)
                                   :poss (c3 / country
                                           :name (n5 / name
                                                   :op1 "Iran")))
                   :mod (o / organization
                          :name (n2 / name
                                  :op1 "UN"
                                  :op2 "Security"
                                  :op3 "Council"))))
  :op2 (l / law
         :polarity -
         :domain r3)
  :op3 (c2 / complicate-01
         :ARG0 r3
         :ARG1 (s / standoff
                 :prep-with (n6 / nation
                              :location (w / world-region
                                          :name (n7 / name
                                                  :op1 "West")))))
  :prep-instead-of (p / promote-02
                     :ARG0 r3
                     :ARG1 (r2 / resolution
                             :poss (i / issue))))

                 :ARG0 c2

                         :ARG1 c2

                                            :mod (l2 / low
                                                   :degree (m / more))))

                                            :mod (n2 / nucleus))

                                                       :manner (r / rapid))
                                            :poss c2)))
                 :mod (o / only))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080303_0416.5 ::date 2013-07-01T02:52:08 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

            :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (o3 / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "Board" :op2 "of" :op3 "Governors")
                        :part-of (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "International" :op2 "Atomic" :op3 "Energy" :op4 "Agency")))
                  :ARG2 (m4 / member)))
      :location (c / city :name (n4 / name :op1 "Vienna"))
      :purpose (d3 / discuss-01
            :ARG0 o3
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (r / report-01
                        :ARG0 (p / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Mohammed" :op2 "ElBaradei")
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG2 (d4 / director
                                          :mod (g / general))))
                        :topic (c4 / country :name (n9 / name :op1 "Iran"))
                        :time (l / late
                              :degree (m3 / most)))
                  :op2 (v / vote-01
                        :ARG0 (o4 / organization :name (n7 / name :op1 "UN" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Council"))
                        :ARG1 (t / thing
                              :ARG2-of (s / sanction-02
                                    :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                                          :ARG0 (r2 / refuse-01
                                                :ARG0 c4
                                                :ARG1 (s3 / suspend-01
                                                      :ARG0 c4
                                                      :ARG1 (e / enrich-01
                                                            :ARG1 (u / uranium))))))
                              :mod (n5 / new))
                        :ARG1-of (s2 / schedule-01
                              :ARG3 (d2 / date-entity :time "16:00" :timezone "GMT")))))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 3 :month 3 :year 2008))

      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))

                  :ARG2 (q3 / question

                                    :mod (n3 / nucleus))
                              :ARG1-of (p3 / purport-01))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080304_0398.6 ::date 2013-07-02T05:47:02 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt UN Security Council sanctions over the Iranian nuclear program reveal that the Security Council has been manipulated to implement the foreign policy of Western countries and undermine the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA).
# ::save-date Mon Sep 2, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080304_0398_6.txt
(r / reveal-01
  :ARG0 (s / sanction-02
          :ARG0 (o / organization
                  :name (n / name
                          :op1 "UN"
                          :op2 "Security"
                          :op3 "Council"))
          :ARG1 (p / program
                  :mod (n2 / nucleus)
                  :mod (c / country
                         :name (n3 / name
                                 :op1 "Iran"))))
  :ARG1 (m / manipulate-02
          :ARG1 o
          :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (i / implement-01
                         :ARG0 o
                         :ARG1 (p2 / policy
                                 :mod (f / foreign)
                                 :poss (c2 / country
                                         :location (w / world-region
                                                     :name (n4 / name
                                                             :op1 "West")))))
                  :op2 (u / undermine-01
                         :ARG0 o
                         :ARG1 (o2 / organization
                                 :name (n5 / name
                                         :op1 "International"
                                         :op2 "Atomic"
                                         :op3 "Energy"
                                         :op4 "Agency"))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080304_0398.8 ::date 2013-07-02T05:47:20 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 20080303 the UN Security Council imposed the 3rd set of sanctions against Iran in 15 months to castigate Iran's refusal to suspend uranium enrichment potentially used to create nuclear weapons.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 2, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080304_0398_8.txt
(i / impose-01
  :ARG0 (o / organization
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "UN"
                  :op2 "Security"
                  :op3 "Council"))
  :ARG1 (s / set
          :consist-of (s2 / sanction-02
                        :ARG0 o
                        :ARG1 (c / country
                                :name (n2 / name
                                        :op1 "Iran")))
          :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity
                 :value 3
                 :range (t / temporal-quantity
                          :quant 15
                          :unit (m / month))))
  :time (d / date-entity
          :day 3
          :month 3
          :year 2008)
  :purpose (c2 / castigate-01
             :ARG0 o
             :ARG1 c
             :ARG2 (r / refuse-01
                     :ARG0 c
                     :ARG1 (s3 / suspend-01
                             :ARG0 c
                             :ARG1 (e / enrich-01
                                     :ARG1 (u / uranium)
                                     :ARG1-of (u2 / use-01
                                                :ARG2 (c3 / create-01
                                                        :ARG1 (w / weapon
                                                                :mod (n3 / nucleus)))
                                                :mod (p / potential)))))))

         :ARG0 c
         :ARG1 (v / vote-01)
         :time (s2 / subsequent)
         :purpose (a2 / and
                    :op1 (o / obtain-01
                           :ARG0 c

                                   :mod (u / unanimous)))
                    :op2 (i2 / increase-01
                           :ARG0 c
                           :ARG1 (i3 / impact-01
                                   :ARG0 (m / message))))))

            :mod (w / world))
      :ARG1-of (f / follow-01
            :ARG2 (v / vote-01
                  :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "UN"))
                  :ARG0-of (r / request-01
                        :ARG1 (t / talk-01
                              :ARG0 (a / and
                                    :op1 (p2 / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Javier" :op2 "Solana")
                                          :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                                :ARG1 (o2 / organization :name (n7 / name :op1 "EU"))
                                                :ARG2 (c / chief
                                                      :mod (p3 / policy
                                                            :mod (f3 / foreign)))))
                                    :op2 (p4 / person :name (n4 / name :op1 "Saeed" :op2 "Jalili")
                                          :ARG0-of (n8 / negotiate-01
                                                :ARG3-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                                      :ARG0 p4
                                                      :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Iran")))
                                                :mod (n5 / nucleus)
                                                :mod (t2 / top))))
                              :ARG1 (r2 / resolve-01
                                    :ARG1 (d / deadlock-01))
                              :degree (f2 / further))))))

                 :name (n2 / name
                         :op1 "Japan"))

                     :ARG2 (p / public)))

                  :ARG0-of (t / trade-01)

                         :name (n5 / name
                                 :op1 "Singapore")))
          :ARG1 (e / export-01
                  :ARG0 (c2 / country
                          :name (n3 / name

                          :ARG1-of (l / launch-01
                                     :mod (m / multiple)))
                  :ARG2 (c3 / country
                          :name (n4 / name
                                  :op1 "Myanmar")))))

                            :polarity -)))

                                :ARG1 (n6 / normalize-01

                        :poss (r / rocket

                                    :mod (m2 / multiple))))
                  :ARG2 (d / distance-quantity :quant 24
                        :unit (c / centimeter)))

                  :ARG1 (l2 / length
                        :poss r)
                  :ARG2 (a2 / about
                        :op1 (o2 / or
                              :op1 (d2 / distance-quantity :quant 1
                                    :unit (m / meter))

                                    :unit (y / yard)))))

                  :ARG1 r
                  :ARG2 (a3 / approximately
                        :op1 (d3 / distance-quantity :quant 65
                              :unit (k / kilometer))))))

  :domain (d / describe-01
            :ARG1 (s / situation
                    :location (c / country
                                :name (n / name
                                        :op1 "Zimbabwe")))
            :ARG2 (v / volatile
                    :mod (q / quite))))

# ::snt The National Conventional Arms Control Act requires that the granting of a permit not contribute to suppression of human rights or provide arms to Governments that systematically violate fundamental freedoms.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080418_0245_33.txt
(r / require-01
      :ARG0 (l / law :name (n2 / name :op1 "National" :op2 "Conventional" :op3 "Arms" :op4 "Control" :op5 "Act"))
      :ARG1 (c / contribute-01 :polarity -
            :ARG0 (g / grant-01
                  :ARG1 (p / permit-01))
            :ARG1 (o / or
                  :op1 (s / suppress-01
                        :ARG1 (r2 / right
                              :mod (h / human)))
                  :op2 (p2 / provide-01
                        :ARG1 (a / arm)
                        :ARG2 (g2 / government-organization
                              :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01)
                              :ARG0-of (v / violate-01
                                    :ARG1 (f / free-41
                                          :mod (f2 / fundamental))
                                    :manner (s2 / systematical)))))))

                        :ARG0 g

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080423_0427.19 ::date 2013-07-03T17:41:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The ADL published advertisements in the International Herald Tribune, The Wall Street Journal and the New York Times with headlines calling Switzerland the world's newest financier of terrorism.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080423_0427_19.txt
(p / publish-01
      :ARG0 (o4 / organization :name (n7 / name :op1 "ADL"))
      :ARG1 (a / advertisement
            :ARG1-of (h / headline-01
                  :ARG2 (t2 / thing
                        :ARG0-of (c / call-01
                              :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n8 / name :op1 "Switzerland"))
                              :ARG2 (c3 / country
                                    :ARG0-of (f / finance-01
                                          :ARG1 (t / terrorism)
                                          :mod (n9 / new
                                                :degree (m / most)
                                                :compared-to (w / world))))))))
      :medium (a2 / and
            :op1 (n / newspaper :name (n2 / name :op1 "International" :op2 "Herald" :op3 "Tribune"))
            :op2 (n3 / newspaper :name (n4 / name :op1 "Wall" :op2 "Street" :op3 "Journal"))
            :op3 (n5 / newspaper :name (n6 / name :op1 "New" :op2 "York" :op3 "Times"))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080423_0427.20 ::date 2013-07-03T17:45:37 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Iran is an Islamic republic.
# ::save-date Sat Jul 6, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080423_0427_20.txt
(r3 / republic
      :domain (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Iran"))
      :mod (r4 / religious-group :name (n4 / name :op1 "Islam")))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080423_0427.21 ::date 2013-07-03T17:47:09 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Governments of Israel and the United States also criticized the deal between Iran's state gas firm and Switzerland's elektrizitaets-Gesellschaft (Egl) laufenburg whereby Iran will reportedly supply 5.5 billion cubic meters (194 trillion cubic feet) of gas annually from 2011.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080423_0427_21.txt
(c6 / criticize-01
      :ARG0 (a3 / and
            :op1 (g5 / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g6 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 (c5 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Israel"))))
            :op2 (g7 / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g8 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 (c9 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States")))))
      :ARG1 (d2 / deal-01
            :ARG0 (f / firm
                  :mod (s / state)
                  :mod (g4 / gas)
                  :poss (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran")))
            :ARG1 (c4 / company :name (n2 / name :op1 "Elektrizitaets-Gesellschaft" :op2 "Laufenburg")
                  :poss (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Switzerland")))
            :ARG0-of (c7 / cause-01
                  :ARG1 (s2 / supply-01
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 (r2 / rate-entity-91
                              :ARG1 (g / gas
                                    :quant (v / volume-quantity :quant 5500000000
                                          :unit (c3 / cubic-meter)))
                              :ARG2 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                                    :unit (y / year)))
                        :time (f2 / from
                              :op1 (d / date-entity :year 2011))
                        :ARG1-of (r / report-01))))
      :mod (a / also))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080425_0198.4 ::date 2013-07-04T11:03:56 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt A man implicated in al-Qaeda's weapons of mass destruction program was given was Canadian passport and then was arrested upon the man's arrival to Canada.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080425_0198_4.txt
(a4 / and
      :op1 (g2 / give-01
            :ARG1 (p3 / passport
                  :mod (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Canada")))
            :ARG2 (m3 / man
                  :ARG1-of (i2 / implicate-01
                        :ARG2 (p4 / program
                              :topic (w2 / weapon
                                    :ARG2-of (d2 / destroy-01
                                          :degree (m4 / mass)))
                              :poss (c4 / criminal-organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "al-Qaeda"))))))
      :op2 (a5 / arrest-01
            :ARG1 m3
            :time (a6 / arrive-01
                  :ARG1 m3
                  :ARG4 c2)
            :time (t / then)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080425_0198.5 ::date 2013-07-04T11:07:42 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The media reported on 080425 that a Pakistan-born man who was implicated in al-Qaeda's weapons of mass destruction program was granted a Canadian visa and then was arrested upon the man's arrival at Canada's largest airport.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080425_0198_5.txt
(r2 / report-01
      :ARG0 (m2 / media)
      :ARG1 (a5 / and
            :op1 (g2 / grant-01
                  :ARG1 (v2 / visa
                        :mod (c5 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Canada")))
                  :ARG2 (m5 / man
                        :ARG1-of (b / bear-02
                              :location (c6 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Pakistan")))
                        :ARG1-of (i2 / implicate-01
                              :ARG2 (p2 / program
                                    :topic (w2 / weapon
                                          :ARG2-of (d3 / destroy-01
                                                :degree (m6 / mass)))
                                    :poss (c7 / criminal-organization :name (n7 / name :op1 "al-Qaeda"))))))
            :op2 (a6 / arrest-01
                  :ARG1 m5
                  :time (a7 / arrive-01
                        :ARG1 m5
                        :ARG4 (a8 / airport
                              :mod (l2 / large
                                    :degree (m3 / most))
                              :location c5))
                  :time (t / then)))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2008 :month 4 :day 25))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080425_0198.6 ::date 2013-07-04T11:12:36 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Canadian Broadcasting Company cited a secret document sent by border authorities to public safety Minister Stockwell Day on 070700 that stated that the Pakistan-born man had obtained a visa from Canada's High Commissioner in London to live temporarily in Canada.
# ::save-date Sun Sep 15, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080425_0198_6.txt
(c6 / cite-01
  :ARG0 (c / company
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Canadian"
                  :op2 "Broadcasting"
                  :op3 "Company"))
  :ARG1 (d2 / document
          :mod (s / secret)
          :ARG1-of (s2 / send-01
                     :ARG0 (a / authority
                             :mod (b / border))
                     :ARG2 (p / person
                             :name (n3 / name
                                     :op1 "Stockwell"
                                     :op2 "Day")
                             :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                        :ARG2 (m / minister
                                                :mod (s3 / safe-41
                                                       :ARG1 (p2 / public)))))
                     :time (d3 / date-entity
                             :year 2007
                             :month 7))
          :ARG0-of (s4 / state-01
                     :ARG1 (o2 / obtain-01
                             :ARG0 (m3 / man
                                     :ARG1-of (b3 / bear-02
                                                :location (c7 / country
                                                            :name (n6 / name
                                                                    :op1 "Pakistan"))))
                             :ARG1 (v2 / visa)
                             :ARG2 (c4 / commissioner
                                     :mod (h / high)
                                     :location (c8 / city
                                                 :name (n8 / name
                                                         :op1 "London"))
                                     :mod (c9 / country
                                            :name (n9 / name
                                                    :op1 "Canada")))
                             :purpose (l2 / live-01
                                        :ARG0 m3
                                        :duration (t2 / temporary)
                                        :location c9)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080425_0198.8 ::date 2013-07-04T11:21:31 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Pakistan-born man was arrested by border guards at Toronto's international airport after arriving on a flight from Newcastle, England.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080425_0198_8.txt
(a / arrest-01
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (g / guard-01
                  :ARG1 (b2 / border)))
      :ARG1 (m / man
            :ARG1-of (b / bear-02
                  :location (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Pakistan"))))
      :location (a2 / airport
            :mod (i / international)
            :location (c2 / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Toronto")))
      :time (a4 / after
            :op1 (a3 / arrive-01
                  :ARG1 m
                  :instrument (f / fly-01
                        :source (c3 / city :name (n3 / name :op1 "Newcastle")
                              :location (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "England")))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080425_0198.9 ::date 2013-07-04T11:22:46 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080425_0198_9.txt
(d / determine-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person
            :ARG0-of (g / guard-01
                  :ARG1 (b / border)))
      :ARG1 (f / flag-02
            :ARG1 (t / threaten-01
                  :ARG0 (m2 / man
                        :ARG1-of (b2 / bear-02
                              :location (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Pakistan"))))
                  :ARG2 (s / security
                        :mod (n / national))))
      :time (v / verify-01
            :ARG0 p2
            :ARG1 (p / passport
                  :poss m2)))

                                         :name (n4 / name

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080429_0271.11 ::date 2013-07-04T07:24:55 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The deal states Iran will supply 5.5 billion cubic meters or 194 trillion cubic feet of gas annually from 2011.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080429_0271_11.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (d2 / deal)
      :ARG1 (s2 / supply-01
            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))
            :ARG1 (r / rate-entity-91
                  :ARG1 (g / gas
                        :quant (v / volume-quantity :quant 5500000000
                              :unit (c4 / cubic-meter)))
                  :ARG2 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                        :unit (y / year)))

# ::save-date Fri Sep 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080522_0345_8.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Britain"))))
                  :ARG2 (s2 / spokesman)))
      :ARG1 (a / ask-02
            :ARG0 (p / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Brown"))
            :ARG1 (a2 / assess-01
                  :ARG0 (g3 / government-organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "Ministry" :op2 "of" :op3 "Defence"))
                  :ARG1 (m / munition
                        :ARG1-of (r / remain-01)
                        :ARG1-of (u / use-01))
                  :purpose (e / ensure-01
                        :ARG0 g3
                        :ARG1 (r2 / risk-01 :polarity -
                              :ARG1 (c2 / civilian))))
            :ARG2 g3
            :mod (a3 / also)))

                        :mod (b / bank
                              :mod c3)
                        :ARG1-of (s / seize-01
                              :ARG0 (a3 / authority))))))

                  :ARG0-of (m / manufacture-01
                        :ARG1 (c2 / centrifuge))

                        :mod (t / terrorism)
                        :location (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Chechnya"))))
            :ARG1-of (a / allege-01)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080701_0012.5 ::date 2013-07-04T09:37:22 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

  :ARG0 (p / person
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Ban"
                  :op2 "Ki-moon"))

          :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (r / revise-01
                         :ARG1 (t / treaty
                                 :name (n2 / name
                                         :op1 "Nuclear"
                                         :op2 "Non-Proliferation"
                                         :op3 "Treaty")))
                  :op2 (s2 / strengthen-01
                         :ARG1 t))
          :purpose (a2 / address-02
                     :ARG0 t
                     :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                             :time (p2 / present)
                             :example (c2 / crisis
                                        :topic (p3 / proliferate-01)
                                        :location (a3 / and
                                                    :op1 (c3 / country
                                                           :name (n3 / name
                                                                   :op1 "North"
                                                                   :op2 "Korea"))
                                                    :op2 (c4 / country
                                                           :name (n4 / name
                                                                   :op1 "Iran"))
                                                    :op3 (c5 / country
                                                           :name (n5 / name
                                                                   :op1 "Syria"))))
                             :ARG2-of (c / challenge-01)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080701_0012.6 ::date 2013-07-04T09:57:46 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Ban" :op2 "Ki-moon")

                  :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "UN"))
                  :ARG2 (s / secretary
                        :mod (g / general))))
      :ARG1 (a / anniversary
            :poss (s2 / sign-02
                  :ARG1 (t2 / treaty :name (n3 / name :op1 "Nuclear" :op2 "Non-Proliferation" :op3 "Treaty")))
            :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity :value 40))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2008 :month 7 :day 1)
      :instrument (u / urge-01
            :ARG0 p2

                  :ARG1 (e / effort
                        :purpose (r / restrict-01
                              :ARG1 (p / proliferate-01
                                    :ARG0 (n4 / nucleus)))))))

                  :op2 (s2 / strengthen-01
                        :ARG1 t))

                  :ARG0 n2

                        :time (p2 / present)

                        :degree (m / most))

                        :ARG1 (p3 / proliferate-01

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080701_0012.11 ::date 2013-07-04T11:05:38 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Wed Jul 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080701_0012_11.txt

      :ARG0 (t / threaten-01
            :ARG1 (p / proliferate-01
                  :mod (n / nucleus)
                  :prep-by (a5 / and
                        :op1 (p4 / person
                              :mod (s / state)
                              :ARG0-of (a / act-01))
                        :op2 (p5 / person
                              :mod (s2 / state :polarity -)
                              :ARG0-of a)))
            :ARG2 (e / everyone))
      :ARG1 (r / require-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (c2 / cooperate-01
                  :ARG2 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (a4 / address-02
                              :ARG1 (c3 / comply-01 :polarity -))
                        :op2 (r2 / resolve-01
                              :ARG1 (c4 / concern-01
                                    :ARG0 (p2 / program
                                          :mod (n2 / nucleus))))
                        :op3 (e2 / ensure-01
                              :ARG1 (c5 / control-01
                                    :ARG1 (m2 / material
                                          :mod n2)
                                    :ARG1-of (r3 / rely-01
                                          :mod (p3 / possible)
                                          :degree (m / most)))))
                  :mod (g / globe))))

                  :op1 (f / framework

                        :mod (c3 / covert)

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080705_0216.8 ::date 2013-07-04T23:14:35 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n / name :op1 "Interior" :op2 "Ministry")

      :ARG1 (d / detain-01

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080723_0409.7 ::date 2013-07-06T07:23:10 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :ARG1 (c3 / cocaine))))

            :ARG1-of (s5 / state-01)

                        :mod (n2 / news)

      :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Lloyd"))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (b3 / between
                  :op1 (t3 / temporal-quantity :quant 5
                        :unit (y3 / year))
                  :op2 (t4 / temporal-quantity :quant 20
                        :unit (y4 / year))
                  :location (p3 / prison))
            :op2 (s / strike-01
                  :ARG2 (c / cane)
                  :quant (b4 / between :op1 5 :op2 15)))
      :condition (c2 / convict-01
            :ARG1 p2
            :ARG2 (c3 / charge-05
                  :ARG2 (t / traffic-00))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080728_0195.4 ::date 2013-07-05T01:28:58 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Libyan Interior Ministry stated on 28 July 2008 that Libyan authorities have seized 110 pounds of heroin.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080728_0195_4.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n / name :op1 "Interior" :op2 "Ministry")
            :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Libya")))
      :ARG1 (s2 / seize-01
            :ARG0 (a / authority
                  :mod c)
            :ARG1 (h / heroin
                  :quant (m / mass-quantity :quant 110
                        :unit (p / pound))))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2008 :month 7 :day 28))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080728_0195.5 ::date 2013-07-05T05:05:28 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080728_0195_5.txt

      :ARG0 (m2 / ministry)
      :ARG1 (a / amount
            :mod (l / large
                  :degree (m / most))
            :ARG1-of (s2 / seize-01
                  :time (e / ever)
                  :location (c / country
                        :mod (w / world-region :name (n2 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Africa"))))
            :domain (a2 / amount
                  :quant-of (h / heroin))))

                  :mod (r / record)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080728_0195.9 ::date 2013-07-05T06:08:54 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :degree (m / most))

                        :time (e / ever)
                        :location (c / country
                              :mod (w / world-region :name (n / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Africa"))))
                  :domain (a2 / amount
                        :quant-of (h / heroin)))
            :op2 (a4 / amount
                  :ARG1-of (r / record-01
                        :location (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Libya")))
                  :mod (l2 / large
                        :degree (m3 / most
                              :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 2)))
                  :domain a2)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080728_0195.10 ::date 2013-07-05T07:01:17 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :ARG1 (e2 / epidemic
                        :location (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Libya")
                              :location-of (c2 / consider-01
                                    :ARG1 (w / weapon
                                          :domain (n2 / narcotic
                                                :mod (l / law :polarity -))
                                          :ARG2-of (d / destroy-01
                                                :degree (m2 / mass))))))))
      :concession-of (e5 / elaborate-01 :polarity -
            :ARG0 m))

      :ARG2 (t / traffic-00
            :ARG1 (d / drug))

            :mod (r / route
                  :mod (k / key)
                  :ARG2-of (t2 / transit-01
                        :ARG1 (d3 / drug
                              :ARG1-of (c3 / come-01
                                    :ARG3 (a / and
                                          :op1 (c4 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Egypt"))
                                          :op2 (c5 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Morocco"))
                                          :op3 (c6 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Turkey")))
                                    :mod (m / main)))))))

                                          :mod (t2 / top)

                                          :mod c)))))
            :location (c2 / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Mexico" :op2 "City"))

      :time (d / date-entity :year 2008 :month 8 :day 1))

                  :ARG0 f

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080916_0019.4 ::date 2013-07-07T06:01:50 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

            :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Amnesty" :op2 "International"))

                  :ARG0 (w / weapon
                        :mod (l / light))))
      :op2 (u / urge-01
            :ARG0 o
            :ARG1 (t / treaty
                  :topic (a2 / arm)
                  :purpose (p / prevent-01
                        :ARG1 (s / sell-01
                              :ARG1 (w2 / weapon)
                              :ARG2 (p2 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (v / violate-01
                                          :ARG1 (r2 / right
                                                :mod (h / human))))))
                  :mod (g / globe))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080916_0019.5 ::date 2013-07-07T06:13:35 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon Jul 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080916_0019_5.txt

      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Amnesty" :op2 "International"))
      :ARG1 (r2 / recommend-01
            :ARG0 o
            :ARG1 (r3 / require-01
                  :ARG0 (t / treaty
                        :topic (a / arm
                              :mod (o2 / organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "UN"))
                              :mod (g / globe))
                        :mod (n3 / new)
                        :ARG2-of (n2 / negotiate-01))
                  :ARG1 (p / prevent-01
                        :ARG0 g2
                        :ARG1 (s2 / sell-01
                              :ARG1 (l2 / likely
                                    :domain (u2 / use-01
                                          :ARG1 (w / weapon
                                                :ARG0-of (v / violate-01
                                                      :ARG1 (r4 / right
                                                            :mod (h / human)))))))
                        :manner (a2 / active))
                  :ARG2 (g2 / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01))))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 17 :month 9 :year 2008)
      :medium (r5 / report :name (n5 / name :op1 "blood" :op2 "at" :op3 "the" :op4 "crossroads")))

                              :ARG2 (v / violate-01

                                          :mod (h / human))))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080916_0019.9 ::date 2013-07-07T07:32:11 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon Sep 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080916_0019_9.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Brian" :op2 "Wood")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (o2 / organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "Amnesty"))
                  :ARG3 (m / manage-01
                        :ARG1 (c / control-01
                              :ARG1 (a / arm)))))
      :ARG1 (a4 / and
            :op1 (d / defy-01
                  :ARG0 (s3 / skeptic
                        :mod (m2 / minority)
                        :ARG0-of (p3 / prefer-01
                              :ARG1 (i / ignore-01
                                    :ARG1 (t / transfer-01
                                          :ARG1 a
                                          :mod (r / responsible :polarity -)))))
                  :ARG1 (a2 / approve-01
                        :ARG0 (c2 / community
                              :mod (i2 / international))
                        :ARG1 c
                        :mod (m4 / majority)))
            :op2 (r2 / render-01
                  :ARG0 s3
                  :ARG1 (a6 / and
                        :op1 (c4 / control-01
                              :ARG1 (a7 / arm
                                    :mod (n5 / national))
                              :quant (m3 / most))
                        :op2 (o3 / organization :name (n6 / name :op1 "UN")
                              :ARG0-of (e3 / embargo-01
                                    :ARG1 a
                                    :quant (m5 / most))))
                  :ARG2 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (w / weak)
                        :op2 (e2 / effective :polarity -)))))

            :op2 (p / pistol)

                  :mod (i / infantry))
            :quant (o / over :op1 1000000)
            :mod (m / majority))

            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (s / security
                        :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iraq")))
                  :ARG2 (p3 / personnel)))
      :time (s2 / since
            :op1 (d2 / date-entity :year 2003)))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20080926_0653.7 ::date 2013-07-08T06:22:51 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (a2 / archbishop :name (n / name :op1 "Desmond" :op2 "Tutu"))
      :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "UN"))

                        :ARG1 o
                        :ARG2 (m / member)))

      :ARG2 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Cape" :op2 "Verde")

                  :ARG1 (c2 / conference :name (n3 / name :op1 "Economic" :op2 "Community" :op3 "of" :op4 "West" :op5 "African" :op6 "States" :op7 "Conference"))))
      :time (d / date-entity
            :weekday (m / monday))
      :prep-as (e / example
            :mod (g / good)
            :mod (t3 / thing
                  :manner (t / turn-01
                        :ARG1 (t2 / tide)
                        :prep-against (c3 / cartel
                              :mod (d2 / drug)
                              :mod (i / international))
                        :mod (p3 / possible)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20081104_0091.4 ::date 2013-07-09T09:33:57 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Denmark's foreign intelligence admitted that claims made in 2003 that Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction were incorrect, yet Prime Minister Anders Fogh Rasmussen stated that weapons of mass destruction were not the reason Denmark entered the war in Iraq.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20081104_0091_4.txt
(c / contrast-01

          :ARG0 (i / intelligence
                  :mod (f / foreign)
                  :poss (c2 / country
                          :name (n / name
                                  :op1 "Denmark")))
          :ARG1 (c4 / correct
                  :polarity -
                  :domain (c3 / claim-01
                            :ARG1 (h / have-03
                                    :ARG0 (p / person
                                            :name (n2 / name
                                                    :op1 "Saddam"
                                                    :op2 "Hussein"))
                                    :ARG1 (w / weapon
                                            :ARG2-of (d / destroy-01
                                                       :degree (m / mass))))
                            :time (d2 / date-entity
                                    :year 2003))))
  :ARG2 (s / state-01
          :ARG0 (p3 / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                          :op1 "Anders"
                          :op2 "Fogh"
                          :op3 "Rasmussen")
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                             :ARG2 (m2 / minister
                                     :mod (p2 / prime))))
          :ARG1 (c5 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1 (e / enter-01
                          :ARG0 c2
                          :ARG1 (w2 / war
                                  :location (c6 / country
                                              :name (n4 / name
                                                      :op1 "Iraq"))))
                  :polarity -)))

                              :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG2 (p2 / president)))))))

                  :ARG1 (u / up-to
                        :op1 (p3 / percentage-entity :value 20))

                        :unit (y / year))
                  :mod (g / grow-01)))
      :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "EU"))
      :mod (t / trade-01)
      :mod (l / large
            :degree (m2 / most
                  :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity :value 3))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20081107_0372.20 ::date 2013-07-10T15:29:26 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Tue Jul 23, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20081107_0372_20.txt

      :ARG0 (t / treaty :name (n3 / name :op1 "Partnership" :op2 "and" :op3 "Cooperation" :op4 "Agreement")
            :time (d / date-entity :year 1997)
            :ARG1-of (r2 / reach-01
                  :time (a / and
                        :op1 (w / weak
                              :domain c
                              :degree (m / more))
                        :op2 (e / emerge-01
                              :ARG0 c
                              :ARG1 (d2 / dissolve-01
                                    :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Soviet" :op2 "Union")
                                          :mod (o2 / old)))))))
      :ARG1 (r / relation
            :mod (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "EU"))
            :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russia")))
      :time (p / present))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20081212_0630.14 ::date 2013-07-11T00:46:00 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Myanmar government began a campaign in the 1990s to eradicate poppy due to pressure from Governments including Myanmar's ally China.
# ::save-date Mon Aug 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20081212_0630_14.txt
(b / begin-01
  :ARG0 (g2 / government-organization
          :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01
                     :ARG1 (c4 / country
                             :name (n2 / name
                                     :op1 "Myanmar"))))
  :ARG1 (c / campaign-01
          :ARG0 g2
          :ARG1 (e / eradicate-01
                  :ARG0 g2
                  :ARG1 (p / poppy)))
  :time (d / date-entity
          :decade 1990)
  :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
             :ARG0 (p2 / pressure-01
                     :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                             :ARG2-of (i / include-01
                                        :ARG1 (c3 / country
                                                :name (n / name
                                                        :op1 "China")
                                                :ARG1-of (a / ally-01
                                                           :ARG2 g2)))
                             :ARG0-of (g4 / govern-01)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20081212_0630.15 ::date 2013-07-11T00:50:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Afghanistan replaced Myanmar as the world's top opium producer.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 31, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20081212_0630_15.txt
(r / replace-01
      :ARG0 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
      :ARG1 (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Myanmar"))
      :prep-as (c / country
            :ARG0-of (p / produce-01
                  :ARG1 (o / opium)
                  :degree (m / most
                        :compared-to (w / world)))))

          :ARG1 (f / free-41
                  :ARG1 c3

                  :time (b / by
                          :op1 (d / date-entity
                                 :year 2014)))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20081212_0630.17 ::date 2013-07-11T01:01:48 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon Jul 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20081212_0630_17.txt
(r / rise-01
      :ARG1 (p / produce-01
            :ARG1 (o / opium)
            :location (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Myanmar"))
            :mod (a / again))
      :time (a2 / after
            :op1 (d / decline-01
                  :mod (s / steep)
                  :duration (f / few
                        :op1 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                              :unit (y / year))))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20081212_0630.18 ::date 2013-07-11T01:06:23 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt In November 2008 U.S. authorities stated the authorities had frozen the assets of 26 individuals and 17 firms tied to drug trafficking in Myanmar and prohibited U.S. citizens from associating with the individuals and firms.
# ::save-date Mon Aug 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20081212_0630_18.txt
(s / state-01
  :ARG0 (a / authority
          :mod (c4 / country
                 :name (n4 / name
                         :op1 "U.S.")))
  :ARG1 (a2 / and
          :op1 (f / freeze-02
                 :ARG0 a
                 :ARG1 (a4 / asset
                         :poss (a5 / and
                                 :op1 (i / individual
                                        :quant 26)
                                 :op2 (f2 / firm
                                        :quant 17)
                                 :ARG1-of (t / tie-01
                                            :ARG1 (t2 / traffic-00
                                                    :ARG1 (d / drug)
                                                    :location (c / country
                                                                :name (n / name
                                                                        :op1 "Myanmar")))))))
          :op2 (p / prohibit-01
                 :ARG0 a
                 :ARG1 (c6 / citizen
                         :mod c4)
                 :ARG2 (a6 / associate-01
                         :ARG1 c6
                         :ARG2 a5)))
  :time (d2 / date-entity
          :year 2008
          :month 11))

                  :op1 (p / person)
                  :op2 (f / firm)

                        :ARG1 (o4 / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Wa" :op3 "State" :op4 "Army")

                                    :degree (m / most)

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20081218_0205.4 ::date 2013-07-11T01:43:30 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

  :ARG0 (p / person
          :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                     :ARG1 (o2 / organization
                             :name (n4 / name
                                     :op1 "EU"))
                     :ARG2 (o3 / official)))
  :ARG1 (a / adopt-01
          :ARG0 (c3 / country
                  :location (w2 / world-region
                              :name (n5 / name
                                      :op1 "North"
                                      :op2 "Africa")))
          :ARG1 (r2 / rule
                  :mod (s / strict
                         :degree (m / more))
                  :topic (t / trade-01
                           :ARG1 (a2 / arm))
                  :poss o2)
          :purpose (c4 / combat-01
                     :ARG0 c3
                     :ARG2 (t2 / terrorism))))

            :mod (d2 / destabilize-01)

  :ARG0 (p / person
          :ARG0-of (r / represent-01
                     :ARG1 (o / organization
                             :name (n / name
                                     :op1 "EU"))))
  :ARG1 (t / talk-01
          :ARG0 p
          :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (c / country
                         :quant 5
                         :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (o2 / organization
                                            :name (n2 / name
                                                    :op1 "Arab"
                                                    :op2 "Maghreb"
                                                    :op3 "Union"))
                                    :ARG2 (m / member)))
                  :op2 (c2 / country
                         :name (n3 / name
                                 :op1 "Egypt")))
          :location (c3 / city
                      :name (n4 / name
                              :op1 "Rabat")
                      :location (c4 / country
                                  :name (n5 / name
                                          :op1 "Morocco"))))
  :time (u / until
          :op1 (d2 / date-entity
                 :year 2008
                 :month 12
                 :day 19)))

          :ARG0-of (a / attend-01
                     :ARG1 (m / meet-03)
                     :location (c4 / country
                                 :name (n7 / name
                                         :op1 "Morocco"))))
  :ARG1 (a5 / aim-01
          :ARG0 m
          :ARG1 (i / improve-01
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                          :op1 (a3 / aid-01
                                 :mod (l / logistics))
                          :op2 (t / train-01
                                 :ARG2 (p2 / person
                                         :ARG0-of (i2 / inspect-01)))
                          :op3 (d / develop-02
                                 :ARG1 (r / relation
                                         :mod (n8 / nation)))
                          :op4 (s2 / support-01

                                                        :op1 "UN"))

                    :name (n2 / name
                            :op1 "Italy")))

          :ARG1 (r / request-01
                  :ARG0 o

                          :ARG1 (r2 / rule

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20081218_0205.16 ::date 2013-07-11T05:51:14 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Amrani"))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (i / increase-01
                  :ARG0 (i2 / increase-01
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (a3 / arm
                                    :mod (s2 / small))
                              :op2 (w / weapon
                                    :mod (l / light))
                              :ARG1-of (c4 / combine-01
                                    :ARG2 (t2 / traffic-00
                                          :ARG1 (a4 / arm)
                                          :mod (l2 / law :polarity -))))
                        :ARG1-of (c3 / check-01 :polarity -))
                  :ARG1 (b / behave-01
                        :ARG1 (c / crime)))
            :op2 (p2 / provoke-01
                  :ARG0 i2
                  :ARG1 (c2 / conflict-01))
            :op3 (d / destabilize-01
                  :ARG0 i2
                  :ARG1 (r / region))
            :op4 (t / threaten-01
                  :ARG0 i2
                  :ARG1 (d2 / develop-01))))

# ::id PROXY_AFP_ENG_20081218_0205.17 ::date 2013-07-11T05:51:27 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt According to the United Nations 47 of 49 conflicts in the 1990s were fought with small arms and light weapons.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 31, 2013 ::file PROXY_AFP_ENG_20081218_0205_17.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (o2 / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations"))
      :ARG1 (c / conflict-01 :quant 47
            :ARG1-of (i / include-91
                  :ARG2 (c2 / conflict-01 :quant 49
                        :time (d / date-entity :decade 1990)))
            :instrument (a / and
                  :op1 (a2 / arm
                        :mod (s2 / small))
                  :op2 (w / weapon
                        :mod (l / light)))))

(d / date-entity :month 1 :day 12 :year 2008)

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.2 ::date 2013-07-10T12:03:33 ::snt-type country ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Korea, Democratic People's Republic of (KP); Korea, Republic of (KR); United States (US)
# ::save-date Wed Jul 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264_2.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Democratic" :op2 "People's" :op3 "Republic" :op4 "of" :op5 "Korea"))
      :op2 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Republic" :op2 "of" :op3 "Korea"))
      :op3 (c3 / country :name (n7 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States")))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.3 ::date 2013-07-10T12:05:55 ::snt-type topic ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt International; Government; proliferation
# ::save-date Wed Jul 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264_3.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (i / international)
      :op2 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))
      :op3 (p / proliferate-01))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.4 ::date 2013-07-10T12:07:06 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt South Korea's incoming government denied that South Korea is considering participating in a United States-led program aimed at stopping the spread of weapons of mass destruction by countries such as North Korea.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264_4.txt
(d / deny-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Korea")))
            :mod (i / incoming))
      :ARG1 (c2 / consider-02
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (p / participate-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (p2 / program
                        :ARG1-of (l / lead-02
                              :ARG0 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States")))
                        :ARG1-of (a / aim-02
                              :ARG2 (s / stop-01
                                    :ARG1 (s2 / spread-01
                                          :ARG0 (c5 / country
                                                :example (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea")))
                                          :ARG1 (w / weapon
                                                :ARG2-of (d2 / destroy-01
                                                      :degree (m / mass))))))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.5 ::date 2013-07-10T12:07:53 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt On 080112 South Korea's incoming government denied a local media report stating that South Korea is considering participating in a United States-led program aimed at stopping the spread of weapons of mass destruction by countries such as North Korea.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264_5.txt
(d / deny-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Korea")))
            :mod (i / incoming))
      :ARG1 (r / report-01
            :ARG0 (m / media
                  :mod (l / local))
            :ARG1 (c2 / consider-02
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (p / participate-01
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 (p2 / program
                              :ARG1-of (l2 / lead-02
                                    :ARG0 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States")))
                              :ARG1-of (a / aim-02
                                    :ARG2 (s2 / stop-01
                                          :ARG1 (s3 / spread-01
                                                :ARG0 (c6 / country
                                                      :example (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea")))
                                                :ARG1 (w / weapon
                                                      :ARG2-of (d3 / destroy-01
                                                            :degree (m2 / mass))))))))))
      :time (d2 / date-entity :month 11 :day 12 :year 2008))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.6 ::date 2013-07-11T12:20:39 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Chosun Ilbo newspaper reported the incoming South Korean government of President-elect Lee Myung-bak was considering a foreign ministry suggestion that South Korea should consider becoming a full member of the Proliferation Security Initiative.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264_6.txt
(r / report-01
      :ARG0 (n6 / newspaper :name (n / name :op1 "Chosun" :op2 "Ilbo"))
      :ARG1 (c3 / consider-02
            :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Korea")))
                  :mod (i / incoming)
                  :poss (p / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Lee" :op2 "Myung-bak")
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG2 (p2 / president
                                    :ARG2-of (e / elect-01
                                          :ARG1 p)))))
            :ARG1 (s / suggest-01
                  :ARG0 (g3 / government-organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "Foreign" :op2 "Ministry"))
                  :ARG1 (r2 / recommend-01
                        :ARG1 (c2 / consider-02
                              :ARG0 c
                              :ARG1 (b / become-01
                                    :ARG1 c
                                    :ARG2 (m2 / member
                                          :mod (f2 / full)
                                          :ARG2-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                                :ARG0 c
                                                :ARG1 (i2 / initiative :name (n5 / name :op1 "Proliferation" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Initiative"))))))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.7 ::date 2013-07-11T12:31:47 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Proliferation Security Initiative calls for stopping and searching ships suspected of carrying weapons of mass destruction.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264_7.txt
(c / call-03
      :ARG0 (i / initiative :name (n / name :op1 "Proliferation" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Initiative"))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (s / stop-01
                  :ARG1 (s3 / ship
                        :ARG2-of (s4 / suspect-01
                              :ARG1 (c2 / carry-01
                                    :ARG0 s3
                                    :ARG1 (w / weapon
                                          :ARG2-of (d / destroy-01
                                                :degree (m / mass)))))))
            :op2 (s2 / search-01
                  :ARG1 s3)))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.8 ::date 2013-07-11T12:36:15 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The South Korean Foreign Ministry reportedly made the recommendation suggesting that South Korea should consider becoming a full member of the Proliferation Security Initiative during a briefing to the South Korean government transition team on 080104.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264_8.txt
(r2 / recommend-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "Foreign" :op2 "Ministry")
            :mod (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Korea")))
      :time (b2 / brief-01
            :ARG1 (t / team
                  :mod (t2 / transition-01)
                  :mod (g2 / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 c2)))
            :time (d / date-entity :month 1 :day 4 :year 2008))
      :ARG0-of (s / suggest-01
            :ARG1 (r3 / recommend-01
                  :ARG1 (c / consider-02
                        :ARG0 c2
                        :ARG1 (b / become-01
                              :ARG1 c2
                              :ARG2 (m / member
                                    :mod (f / full)
                                    :ARG2-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG0 c2
                                          :ARG1 (i / initiative :name (n / name :op1 "Proliferation" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Initiative"))))))))
      :ARG1-of (r / report-01))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.9 ::date 2013-07-11T13:32:16 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Chosun Ilbo newspaper report stated that the South Korean Foreign Ministry stated that becoming a full member of the Proliferation Security Initiative would be helpful in strengthening South Korea's alliance with the United States.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264_9.txt
(r / report-01
      :ARG0 (n2 / newspaper :name (n / name :op1 "Chosun" :op2 "Ilbo"))
      :ARG1 (s2 / state-01
            :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "Foreign" :op2 "Ministry")
                  :mod (c2 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Korea")))
            :ARG1 (h / help-01
                  :ARG0 (b / become-01
                        :ARG1 c2
                        :ARG2 (m / member
                              :mod (f / full)
                              :ARG2-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG0 c2
                                    :ARG1 (i / initiative :name (n4 / name :op1 "Proliferation" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Initiative")))))
                  :ARG1 (s3 / strengthen-01
                        :ARG1 (a / ally-01
                              :ARG1 c2
                              :ARG2 (c3 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States")))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.10 ::date 2013-07-11T20:55:53 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The South Korean Foreign Ministry Spokesman Cho Hee-Yong also declined to confirm that the South Korean Foreign Ministry had made the proposal suggesting that South Korea should consider becoming a full member of the Proliferation Security Initiative.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264_10.txt
(d / decline-02
      :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Cho" :op2 "Hee-Yong")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (g / government-organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "Foreign" :op2 "Ministry")
                        :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Korea")))
                  :ARG2 (s / spokesman)))
      :ARG1 (c4 / confirm-01
            :ARG0 p2
            :ARG1 (p / propose-01
                  :ARG0 g
                  :ARG0-of (s2 / suggest-01
                        :ARG1 (r / recommend-01
                              :ARG1 (c2 / consider-02
                                    :ARG0 c
                                    :ARG1 (b / become-01
                                          :ARG1 c
                                          :ARG2 (m / member
                                                :mod (f / full)
                                                :ARG2-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                                      :ARG0 c
                                                      :ARG1 (i / initiative :name (n7 / name :op1 "Proliferation" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Initiative"))))))))))
      :mod (a / also))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.11 ::date 2013-07-11T21:04:34 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt In a 1 sentence statement issued later in the day on 080112 Cho Hee-Yong stated that there is no change in the South Korean government's basic position that we support the purpose and principle of the Proliferation Security Initiative and South Korea will adjust the scope of South Korea's participation according to South Korea's judgment.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264_11.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Cho" :op2 "Hee-Yong"))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (c / change-01 :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (p2 / position
                        :mod (g / government-organization
                              :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                                    :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Korea"))))
                        :mod (b / basic)
                        :consist-of (a4 / and
                              :op1 (s3 / support-01
                                    :ARG0 c2
                                    :ARG1 (a2 / and
                                          :op1 (p3 / purpose
                                                :mod (i / initiative :name (n3 / name :op1 "Proliferation" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Initiative")))
                                          :op2 (p4 / principle
                                                :mod i)))
                              :op2 (a3 / adjust-01
                                    :ARG0 c2
                                    :ARG1 (s5 / scope
                                          :mod (p5 / participate-01
                                                :ARG0 c2))
                                    :ARG0-of (c3 / conform-01
                                          :ARG1 (j / judge-01
                                                :ARG0 c2)))))))
      :medium (s6 / statement
            :consist-of (s2 / sentence :quant 1)
            :ARG1-of (i2 / issue-01
                  :time (l / late
                        :op1 (d / date-entity :month 1 :day 12 :year 2008)
                        :degree (m / more)))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.12 ::date 2013-07-11T21:20:41 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Park Jung-Ha stated without any further elaboration to the Associated Press that the incoming South Korean government have not discussed the Proliferation Security Initiative at all.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264_12.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Park" :op2 "Jung-Ha"))
      :ARG1 (d / discuss-01 :polarity -
            :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Korea")))
                  :mod (i2 / incoming))
            :ARG1 (i / initiative :name (n4 / name :op1 "Proliferation" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Initiative"))
            :degree (a2 / at-all))
      :ARG2 (c / company :name (n2 / name :op1 "Associated" :op2 "Press"))
      :manner (e / elaborate-01 :polarity -
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 d
            :mod (a / any)
            :degree (f / further)))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.13 ::date 2013-07-11T21:29:26 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Park Jung-ha is a transition team spokesman.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264_13.txt
(h / have-org-role-91
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Park" :op2 "Jung-ha"))
      :ARG1 (t / team
            :mod (t2 / transition-01))
      :ARG2 (s / spokesman))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.14 ::date 2013-07-11T21:30:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The North Korean government has warned the South Korean government against participating in the Proliferation Security Initiative program.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264_14.txt
(w / warn-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))))
      :ARG1 (p / participate-01 :polarity -
            :ARG0 c2
            :ARG1 (p2 / program :name (n3 / name :op1 "Proliferation" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Initiative")))
      :ARG2 (g3 / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g4 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Korea")))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.15 ::date 2013-07-11T21:35:44 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The North Korean government stated if the South Korean government participates in the proliferation security initiative program it would result in unspecified catastrophic consequences.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264_15.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization
            :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                  :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))))
      :ARG1 (r / result-01
            :ARG1 (p / participate-01
                  :ARG0 (g3 / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (g4 / govern-01
                              :ARG1 (c4 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Korea"))))
                  :ARG1 (p2 / program :name (n3 / name :op1 "Proliferation" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Initiative")))
            :ARG2 (c2 / consequence
                  :mod (c3 / catastrophe)
                  :ARG1-of (s2 / specify-01 :polarity -))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.16 ::date 2013-07-11T21:42:26 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Proliferation Security Initiative was launched in 030000 primarily to deter trade in missile and nuclear technology by States such as North Korea and Iran.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264_16.txt
(l / launch-01
      :ARG1 (i / initiative :name (n / name :op1 "Proliferation" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Initiative"))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2003)
      :purpose (d2 / deter-01
            :ARG1 (t / trade-01
                  :ARG0 (s / state
                        :example (a / and
                              :op1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))
                              :op2 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Iran"))))
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (m / missile)
                        :op2 (t2 / technology
                              :mod (n4 / nucleus))))
            :mod (p / primary)))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.17 ::date 2013-07-11T21:46:18 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Countries participating in the proliferation security initiative hold maritime drills to search ships suspected of carrying nuclear, chemical and biological weapons, materials to make these weapons, or missiles to deliver these weapons.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264_17.txt
(h / hold-04
      :ARG0 (c / country
            :ARG0-of (p / participate-01
                  :ARG1 (i / initiative :name (n / name :op1 "Proliferation" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Initiative"))))
      :ARG1 (d / drill-02
            :mod (m / maritime))
      :purpose (s / search-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (s2 / ship
                  :ARG2-of (s3 / suspect-01
                        :ARG1 (c2 / carry-01
                              :ARG0 s2
                              :ARG1 (a / and
                                    :op1 (a2 / and
                                          :op1 (w / weapon
                                                :mod (n2 / nucleus))
                                          :op2 (w2 / weapon
                                                :mod (c3 / chemical))
                                          :op3 (w3 / weapon
                                                :mod (b / biology)))
                                    :op2 (m2 / material
                                          :ARG2-of (m3 / make-01
                                                :ARG1 a2))
                                    :op3 (m4 / missile
                                          :ARG0-of (d2 / deliver-01
                                                :ARG1 a2))))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.18 ::date 2013-07-11T21:57:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt South Korea has only been an observer to the Proliferation Security Initiative Program and the South Korean government has so far refused United States requests to become a full member of the Proliferation Security Initiative program.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264_18.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (o2 / observe-01
            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Korea"))
            :ARG1 (p / program :name (n2 / name :op1 "Proliferation" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Initiative"))
            :mod (o3 / only))
      :op2 (r / refuse-01
            :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                  :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01
                        :ARG1 c))
            :ARG1 (r2 / request-01
                  :ARG0 (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))
                  :ARG1 (b / become-01
                        :ARG1 c
                        :ARG2 (m / member
                              :mod (f2 / full)
                              :ARG2-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG0 c
                                    :ARG1 p))))
            :time (s2 / so-far)))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.19 ::date 2013-07-11T22:12:02 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (g / government-organization

      :ARG1 (w / want-01 :polarity -
            :ARG0 c2
            :ARG1 (p / provoke-01
                  :ARG0 c2
                  :ARG1 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea")))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.20 ::date 2013-07-11T22:14:58 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt North Korea views the Proliferation Security Initiative program as a United States attempt to overthrow the Communist regime in North Korea.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264_20.txt
(v / view-02
      :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))
      :ARG1 (p / program :name (n2 / name :op1 "Proliferation" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Initiative"))
      :ARG2 (a / attempt-01
            :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))
            :ARG1 (o2 / overthrow-01
                  :ARG0 c2
                  :ARG1 (r / regime
                        :mod (c3 / communism)
                        :location c))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.21 ::date 2013-07-11T22:19:01 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
