      :ARG0 (g / government-organization

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.22 ::date 2013-07-11T22:20:30 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Lee Myung-bak has stated that he would strengthen relations with the United States because the United States and South Korea lacked trust under the outgoing South Korean administration.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264_22.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Lee" :op2 "Myung-bak"))
      :ARG1 (s2 / strengthen-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (r2 / relation
                  :prep-with (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))))
      :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (l / lack-01
                  :ARG0 (a / and
                        :op1 c
                        :op2 (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Korea")))
                  :ARG1 (t / trust)
                  :time (g / government-organization
                        :ARG0-of (a2 / administrate-01
                              :ARG1 c3)
                        :mod (o / outgoing)))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.23 ::date 2013-07-11T13:33:46 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
            :ARG2 (m2 / mayor
                  :mod (c / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Seoul"))
                  :mod (f / former)
                  :mod (c2 / conservative))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264.24 ::date 2013-07-11T13:35:12 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Lee Myung-Bak will take take the Office of the President of South Korea on 080225.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080112_0264_24.txt
(t / take-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Lee" :op2 "Myung-Bak"))
      :ARG1 (o / office
            :mod (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "South" :op2 "Korea"))
                        :ARG2 (p3 / president))))
      :time (d / date-entity :month 2 :day 25 :year 2008))

                  :mod (m / military)

                        :ARG1 (b2 / build-01
                              :ARG0 c3
                              :ARG1 (s2 / submarine
                                    :mod (n / nucleus)))
                        :ARG2 c3
                        :mod (p / possible)))
            :ARG2 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "France"))))

                                     :op2 "Ministry"))
                     :ARG2 (s2 / spokesman)))

          :op1 (t / travel-01
                 :ARG0 (p6 / person
                         :name (n3 / name
                                 :op1 "Nelson"
                                 :op2 "Jobim")

                                    :ARG2 (m3 / minister
                                            :mod (d6 / defense))))
                 :ARG1 (c / country
                         :name (n4 / name
                                 :op1 "France"))
                 :duration (d7 / date-interval

                                    :month 1
                                    :day 20
                                    :year 2008)
                             :op2 (d2 / date-entity
                                    :month 1
                                    :day 26
                                    :year 2008)))
          :op2 (h / have-purpose-91
                 :ARG1 (v / visit-01)
                 :ARG2 (d3 / discuss-01
                         :ARG0 p6
                         :ARG1 (p3 / purchase-01
                                 :ARG1 (s7 / submarine
                                         :mod (c3 / class
                                                :name (n7 / name
                                                        :op1 "Scorpene"))
                                         :ARG1-of (p4 / power-01
                                                    :ARG2 (d4 / diesel))
                                         :ARG0-of (s5 / serve-01

                                                            :purpose (d5 / develop-02

                 :mod (m / main))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080209_0664.7 ::date 2013-07-14T07:22:06 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt ElBaradei said that even countries which have nuclear weapons know that a country which uses nuclear weapons will be pulverized but that extremist groups will use nuclear weapons if possible.

  :ARG0 (p / person
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "ElBaradei"))

          :ARG1 (k / know-01
                  :ARG0 (c / country
                          :mod (e2 / even)
                          :ARG0-of (h / have-03
                                     :ARG1 (w2 / weapon
                                             :mod (n3 / nucleus))))
                  :ARG1 (p3 / pulverize-01
                          :ARG1 (c2 / country
                                  :ARG0-of (u2 / use-01
                                             :ARG1 (w3 / weapon
                                                     :mod (n4 / nucleus))))))
          :ARG2 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 (g / group
                          :mod (e / extremist))
                  :ARG1 (w / weapon
                          :mod (n2 / nucleus))
                  :condition (p2 / possible
                               :domain u))))

                    :degree (m / more
                              :degree (f / far)))
          :mod (a2 / also)))

      :ARG0 (i / individual)
      :ARG1 (p / pocket
            :poss (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (b2 / broker-01
                        :ARG1 (k / kidney))))
      :ARG2 (b / bill
            :quant (m / monetary-quantity :quant 10
                  :unit (d / dollar))))

                                             :ARG1 (o3 / organ)
                                             :mod (i3 / international))))))
  :ARG2 (j2 / journal
          :name (n3 / name
                  :op1 "World"
                  :op2 "Health"

                  :op4 "Bulletin")

                  :month 12
                  :year 2007)))

          :manner (g / good
                    :polarity -))
  :mod (a / also))

      :ARG0 (d / dossier

                                    :degree (m2 / mass)))

                              :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 45
                                    :unit (m3 / minute)))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080218_0615.9 ::date 2013-07-14T13:51:21 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The claim that Iraq could launch weapons of mass destruction within 45 minutes was an allegation that became crucial to Blair's support of the 030000 United States led invasion of Iraq and the allegation was later discredited.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080218_0615_9.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (b / become-01
            :ARG1 (a2 / allege-01
                  :ARG1 (p2 / possible
                        :domain (l / launch-01
                              :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iraq"))
                              :ARG1 (w / weapon
                                    :ARG2-of (d2 / destroy-01
                                          :degree (m2 / mass)))
                              :time (w2 / within
                                    :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 45
                                          :unit (m3 / minute)))))
                  :domain (c5 / claim-01))
            :ARG2 (c4 / crucial)
            :beneficiary (s / support-01
                  :ARG0 (p / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Blair"))
                  :ARG1 (i / invade-01
                        :ARG1 c
                        :ARG1-of (l2 / lead-02
                              :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States")))
                        :time (d / date-entity :year 2003))))
      :op2 (d3 / discredit-01
            :ARG1 a2
            :time (l3 / late
                  :degree (m4 / more))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080218_0615.10 ::date 2013-07-14T14:16:16 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Freedom of Information campaigners allege the assertion that that Iraq could launch weapons of mass destruction within 45 minutes was inserted into later drafts of the dossier of prewar intelligence shortly before the dossier was published on the orders of Tony Blair's office in order to strengthen the case for war in Iraq.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 25, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080218_0615_10.txt
(a / allege-01
      :ARG0 (p3 / person
            :ARG0-of (c3 / campaign-01
                  :ARG1 (f / free-41
                        :ARG2 (i2 / information))))
      :ARG1 (i / insert-01
            :ARG1 (a2 / assert-03
                  :ARG1 (p2 / possible
                        :domain (l2 / launch-01
                              :ARG0 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iraq"))
                              :ARG1 (w / weapon
                                    :ARG2-of (d / destroy-01
                                          :degree (m2 / mass)))
                              :time (w2 / within
                                    :op1 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 45
                                          :unit (m / minute))))))
            :ARG2 (d2 / dossier
                  :ARG1-of (d3 / draft-01
                        :time (l3 / late
                              :degree (m3 / more)))
                  :source (i3 / intelligence
                        :time (p4 / pre
                              :op1 (w3 / war))))
            :time (b / before
                  :op1 (p5 / publish-01
                        :ARG1 d2
                        :ARG2-of (o / order-01
                              :ARG0 (o2 / office
                                    :poss (p / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Tony" :op2 "Blair"))))
                        :purpose (s2 / strengthen-01
                              :ARG0 d2
                              :ARG1 (c4 / case
                                    :topic (w4 / war
                                          :location c))))
                  :mod (s / shortly))))

                  :poss (c / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Iraq")))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080218_0615.17 ::date 2013-07-15T03:53:12 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt A second document was published in 030200 was found to have repeated verbatim parts of an academic study on Iraq's supposed concealment of weapons of mass destruction.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080218_0615_17.txt
(f / find-01
      :ARG1 (r / repeat-01
            :ARG0 (d2 / document
                  :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 2)
                  :ARG1-of (p / publish-01
                        :time (d / date-entity :month 2 :year 2003)))
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :ARG2-of (h / have-part-91
                        :ARG1 (s2 / study
                              :mod (a / academia)
                              :topic (c2 / conceal-01
                                    :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iraq"))
                                    :ARG1 (w / weapon
                                          :ARG2-of (d3 / destroy-01
                                                :degree (m / mass)))
                                    :ARG1-of (s3 / suppose-01)))))
            :manner (v / verbatim)))

                  :part-of (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080227_0458.7 ::date 2013-07-16T02:15:53 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The North Atlantic Treaty Organization's International Security Assistance Force stated that the North Atlantic Treaty Organization soldiers were on routine patrol when the bomb detonated in the Sharan district of Paktika province on 080226.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080227_0458_7.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (m3 / military :name (n2 / name :op1 "International" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Assistance" :op4 "Force")
            :poss (m / military :name (n / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Atlantic" :op3 "Treaty" :op4 "Organization")))
      :ARG1 (p2 / patrol-01
            :ARG0 (s2 / soldier
                  :mod m)
            :mod (r / routine)
            :time (d2 / detonate-01
                  :ARG1 (b / bomb)
                  :location (d3 / district :name (n4 / name :op1 "Sharan")
                        :location (p / province :name (n5 / name :op1 "Paktika")))
                  :time (d / date-entity :day 26 :month 2 :year 2008))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080227_0458.8 ::date 2013-07-16T02:24:20 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The International Security Assistance Force did not provide the nationalities of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization soldiers killed.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080227_0458_8.txt
(p / provide-01 :polarity -
      :ARG0 (m2 / military :name (n / name :op1 "International" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Assistance" :op4 "Force"))
      :ARG1 (n3 / nationality
            :mod (s / soldier
                  :ARG1-of (k / kill-01)
                  :mod (m / military :name (n2 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Atlantic" :op3 "Treaty" :op4 "Organization")))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080227_0458.9 ::date 2013-07-16T02:40:37 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt According to an Associated Press tally of figures from the International Security Assistance Force and the United States-led coalition, 21 foreign troops have killed in Afghanistan so far this year.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080227_0458_9.txt
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (t / tally-01
            :ARG0 (p / publication :name (n / name :op1 "Associated" :op2 "Press"))
            :ARG1 (f / figure
                  :source (a / and
                        :op1 (m / military :name (n2 / name :op1 "International" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Assistance" :op4 "Force"))
                        :op2 (c / coalition
                              :ARG1-of (l / lead-02
                                    :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States")))))))
      :ARG1 (k / kill-01
            :ARG1 (t2 / troop :quant 21
                  :mod (f2 / foreign))
            :time (s2 / so-far
                  :op1 (y / year
                        :mod (t3 / this)))
            :location (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080227_0458.10 ::date 2013-07-16T02:51:34 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Insurgency-related violence killed 222 foreign troops and more than 6500 people in total in Afghanistan in 070000.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080227_0458_10.txt
(k / kill-01
      :ARG0 (v / violence
            :ARG1-of (r / relate-01
                  :ARG2 (i / insurgency)))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (t / troops :quant 222
                  :mod (f / foreign))
            :op2 (p / person
                  :quant (m2 / more-than :op1 6500
                        :ARG2-of (t2 / total-01))))
      :location (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2007))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080227_0458.11 ::date 2013-07-16T03:02:57 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 070000 was the deadliest year since the United States-led invasion of Afghanistan began in 2001.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080227_0458_11.txt
(d / date-entity :year 2007
      :time-of (d4 / die-01
            :degree (m / most)
            :time (s / since
                  :op1 (b / begin-01
                        :ARG1 (i / invade-01
                              :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
                              :ARG1-of (l / lead-02
                                    :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))))
                        :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2001)))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080227_0458.12 ::date 2013-07-16T03:14:22 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt On 080226 the International Security Assistance Force stated that North Atlantic Treaty Organization soldiers and Afghan soldiers discovered and destroyed a large quantity of opium during a patrol last week in the Sangin district of southern Helmand province.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080227_0458_12.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (m2 / military :name (n / name :op1 "International" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Assistance" :op4 "Force"))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (d2 / discover-01
                  :ARG0 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (s2 / soldier
                              :mod (m / military :name (n2 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Atlantic" :op3 "Treaty" :op4 "Organization")))
                        :op2 (s3 / soldier
                              :mod (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))))
                  :ARG1 (o / opium
                        :quant (q / quantity
                              :mod (l2 / large))))
            :op2 (d3 / destroy-01
                  :ARG0 a2
                  :ARG1 o)
            :time (p3 / patrol-01
                  :ARG0 a2
                  :ARG1 (d4 / district :name (n4 / name :op1 "Sangin")
                        :location (p2 / province :name (n5 / name :op1 "Helmand")
                              :mod (s4 / south)))
                  :time (w / week
                        :mod (l3 / last))))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2008 :month 2 :day 26))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080227_0458.13 ::date 2013-07-16T03:32:53 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Helmand province has been the frontline of the bloodiest battles in recent years between militants and foreign forces.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080227_0458_13.txt
(p / province :name (n / name :op1 "Helmand")
      :location-of (b / battle-01
            :ARG1 (m / militant)
            :ARG2 (f2 / force
                  :mod (f3 / foreign))
            :time (y / year
                  :mod (r / recent))
            :mod (b2 / bloody
                  :degree (m2 / most)))
      :mod (f / frontline))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080227_0458.14 ::date 2013-07-16T03:39:36 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Helmand province is the world's largest opium-producing region.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080227_0458_14.txt
(r / region
      :domain (p / province :name (n / name :op1 "Helmand"))
      :ARG0-of (p2 / produce-01
            :ARG1 (o / opium))
      :mod (l / large
            :degree (m / most)
            :compared-to (w / world)))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080227_0458.15 ::date 2013-07-16T03:47:41 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Officials estimate that up to 40 percent of proceeds from Afghanistan's drug trade is used to fund the insurgency.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 13, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080227_0458_15.txt
(e / estimate-01
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (o / official)))
      :ARG1 (u / use-01
            :ARG1 (u2 / up-to
                  :op1 (p2 / percentage-entity :value 40
                        :quant-of (t / thing
                              :ARG1-of (p3 / proceed-00
                                    :ARG2 (t2 / trade-01
                                          :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
                                          :ARG1 (d / drug))))))
            :ARG2 (f / fund-01
                  :ARG1 (i / insurgency))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080227_0458.16 ::date 2013-07-16T03:59:49 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 40 percent of proceeds of Afghanistan's drug trade is worth tens of millions of United States dollars.
# ::save-date Tue Jul 16, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080227_0458_16.txt
(v / value-01
      :ARG1 (p / percentage-entity :value 40
            :quant-of (t / thing
                  :ARG1-of (p2 / proceed-00
                        :ARG2 (t2 / trade-01
                              :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
                              :ARG1 (d2 / drug)))))
      :ARG2 (m / multiple
            :op1 (m2 / monetary-quantity :quant 10000000
                  :unit (d / dollar
                        :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080304_0802.4 ::date 2013-07-11T04:15:33 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Colombian Vice President Francisco Santos stated to the main world disarmament body in Geneva that Colombian police have found computer evidence indicating the FARC movement has been attempting to obtain radioactive material to build dirty bombs.
# ::save-date Tue Aug 27, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080304_0802_4.txt
(s / state-01
  :ARG0 (p3 / person
          :name (n5 / name
                  :op1 "Francisco"
                  :op2 "Santos")
          :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                     :ARG1 (c / country
                             :name (n / name
                                     :op1 "Colombia"))
                     :ARG2 (p4 / president
                             :mod (v2 / vice))))
  :ARG1 (f / find-01
          :ARG0 (p2 / police
                  :mod c)
          :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :ARG0-of (e / evidence-01)
                  :source (c3 / computer)
                  :ARG0-of (i / indicate-01
                             :ARG1 (a / attempt-01
                                     :ARG0 (m2 / movement
                                             :name (n4 / name
                                                     :op1 "FARC"))
                                     :ARG1 (o2 / obtain-01
                                             :ARG0 m2
                                             :ARG1 (m4 / material
                                                     :mod (r / radioactive))
                                             :purpose (b / build-01
                                                        :ARG0 m2
                                                        :ARG1 (b2 / bomb
                                                                :mod (d2 / dirty))))))))
  :ARG2 (b3 / body
          :mod (d / disarm-01
                 :mod (w / world))
          :mod (m / main)
          :location (c2 / city
                      :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Geneva"))))

                                                :mod (d3 / dirty)))

                                          :ARG0 g

            :mod (d / disarm-01
                  :mod (w / world)))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080304_0925.7 ::date 2013-07-12T01:28:08 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Conference on Disarmament contains 65 members.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080304_0925_7.txt
(c / contain-01
      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Conference" :op2 "on" :op3 "Disarmament"))
      :ARG1 (p / person :quant 65
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 o
                  :ARG2 (m2 / member))))

                  :topic (c2 / connect-01
                           :ARG1 (a2 / and
                                   :op1 (t / traffic-00

          :mod (s / security)

                 :name (n / name

          :name (n2 / name

                  :op2 "Reyes"))

          :month 3
          :day 1)
  :location (c2 / country
              :name (n3 / name
                      :op1 "Ecuador")))

      :op2 (f / face
            :mod (p2 / public)
            :part-of o
            :domain p)
      :op3 (h2 / have-org-role-91
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 o
            :ARG2 (s3 / spokesman)))

                                     :op2 (s3 / sell-01

                                            :ARG1 u)))))

          :month 3
          :day 3))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080304_0925.12 ::date 2013-07-12T02:56:44 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                        :mod (e2 / economy)
                        :poss (t / traffic-00
                              :ARG1 (d3 / drug)))
                  :ARG1 (c / constitute-01
                        :ARG1 (t3 / threaten-01
                              :ARG0 g
                              :ARG2 (a2 / and
                                    :op1 (c3 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Colombia"))

                                                :mod (w2 / world-region :name (n5 / name :op1 "Latin" :op2 "America")))
                                          :mod (e3 / entire)))
                              :mod (s2 / serious)))
                  :ARG2 (g / group
                        :mod (t2 / terrorist)))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080304_0925.13 ::date 2013-07-12T03:34:15 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

  :domain (u / uranium)
  :mod (r / radioactive)

             :ARG1 (a / and
                     :op1 (g / generate-01
                            :ARG1 (w / weapon
                                    :mod (d / dirty)
                                    :ARG2-of (d2 / destroy-01
                                               :degree (m2 / mass))))
                     :op2 (t / terrorism))
             :mod (p / primary)))

            :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (b / base-02
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (g3 / generate-01

                                          :mod (d2 / dirty)
                                          :ARG2-of (d3 / destroy-01
                                                :degree (m2 / mass))))
                              :op2 (t2 / terrorism))
                        :ARG2 (u / uranium)
                        :mod (p / primary))))
      :ARG2 (p4 / person :quant 65
            :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c3 / conference :name (n3 / name :op1 "Conference" :op2 "on" :op3 "Disarmament"))
                  :ARG2 (m3 / member)))

                                                                :mod (r / radioactive)
                                                                :mod (d2 / dirty))))))

                 :polarity -)
         :ARG2 (p2 / publication
                 :name (n2 / name

         :time (d / date-entity

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080306_0007.8 ::date 2013-07-15T19:16:58 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon Aug 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080306_0007_8.txt

      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Santos"))

            :op1 (m / mean-01
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (a3 / and

                              :ARG1 (n5 / note-02))
                        :op2 (t3 / take-01 :polarity -
                              :ARG1 (i2 / it)
                              :mod (l / light))))
            :op2 (a2 / alarm-01
                  :ARG0 (p3 / put-01
                        :ARG1 (a4 / and
                              :op1 (r / rebel-01
                                    :ARG0 (c2 / criminal-organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "FARC")))
                              :op2 (w / word-01
                                    :ARG1 (u / uranium)))
                        :ARG2 (s2 / sentence-01
                              :ARG3-of (s3 / same-41)))))
      :time (i / interview-01
            :medium (t / telephone-01))
      :location (c / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Brussels")))

              :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                     :quant 4
                     :unit (d / decade)))
  :manner (u / use-01
            :ARG1 (w / weapon
                    :mod (c2 / conventional))))

                  :ARG2 g)))

            :mod (s / strict
                  :degree (m / most)))
      :ARG2 (l2 / law
            :mod (w / world)

          :op2 (r / require-01
                 :ARG0 (s / situation
                         :mod (d / dire))
                 :ARG1 (m / mediate-01))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080417_0885.8 ::date 2013-07-16T02:27:09 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :op1 "Maseko"))

         :degree (m / most))

                        :op1 (v2 / vote-01
                              :time (d / date-entity :day 29 :month 3 :year 2008))))
            :op2 (r / refuse-01
                  :ARG0 (c2 / commission
                        :mod (e / elect-01)
                        :location c)

                                                :ARG0-of (o3 / oppose-01)))

                                                :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                                      :ARG2 (p4 / president)))
                                          :ARG1 (v3 / vote-01))))))))

          :month 4
          :year 2008)

                                                    :op1 "South"
                                                    :op2 "Africa"))

                                                                :mod c)
                                                        :destination (c4 / country
                                                                       :name (n5 / name
                                                                               :op1 "Zimbabwe")))))))))

          :op1 (r / receive-01

                 :time (l / late

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080417_0885.31 ::date 2013-07-18T03:55:55 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon Aug 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080417_0885_31.txt
(r / refer-02
      :ARG0 (o2 / office
            :poss (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Mufamadi")))
      :ARG1 (p4 / person
            :ARG0-of (r3 / return-02
                  :ARG1 (c3 / call
                        :mod (p3 / phone))
                  :mod (i / immediate :polarity -))

                  :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "Arms" :op2 "Control" :op3 "Committee"))
                  :ARG2 (s / spokesman)))
      :ARG2 (p2 / person
            :ARG0-of (r2 / report-01)))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080417_1113.24 ::date 2013-07-21T10:48:20 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The South African Revenue Service stated that the ship would be subject to standard inspection procedures and the cargo would not be released until ithe cargo was proved to be compliant to customs formalities.
# ::save-date Wed Aug 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080417_1113_24.txt
(s / state-01
  :ARG0 (g / government-organization
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Revenue"
                  :op2 "Service")
          :mod (c / country
                 :name (n2 / name
                         :op1 "South"
                         :op2 "Africa")))
  :ARG1 (a / and
          :op1 (s2 / subject-01
                 :ARG1 (s3 / ship)
                 :ARG2 (p / procedure
                         :instrument-of (i / inspect-01
                                          :ARG1 s3)
                         :mod (s4 / standard)))
          :op2 (r / release-01
                 :ARG1 (c2 / cargo)
                 :polarity -
                 :duration (u / until
                             :op1 (p2 / prove-01
                                    :ARG1 (c3 / comply-01
                                            :ARG0 c2
                                            :ARG1 (f / formality
                                                    :mod (c4 / customs))))))))

# ::save-date Sun Jul 28, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080417_1113_25.txt
(p / possible
      :domain (l / lengthy
            :domain (p2 / process
                  :mod (a / approve-01))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_0971.4 ::date 2013-07-17T18:37:10 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The United Nations Security Council passed a resolution on April 25, 2008 that will keep weapons of mass destruction out of the hands of terrorists.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 9, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_0971_4.txt
(p / pass-01
  :ARG0 (o / organization
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "United"
                  :op2 "Nations"
                  :op3 "Security"
                  :op4 "Council"))
  :ARG1 (r / resolution
          :ARG0-of (k / keep-04
                     :ARG1 (w / weapon
                             :ARG2-of (d2 / destroy-01
                                        :degree (m2 / mass)))
                     :ARG2 (h / hand
                             :part-of (t / terrorist))))
  :time (d / date-entity
          :day 25
          :month 4
          :year 2008))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_0971.5 ::date 2013-07-17T18:43:17 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The United Nations Security Council is urging increased efforts to keep weapons of mass destruction out of the hands of terrorist and black marketeers.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_0971_5.txt
(u / urge-01
      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations" :op3 "Security" :op4 "Council"))
      :ARG1 (e / effort
            :purpose (k / keep-04
                  :ARG1 (w / weapon
                        :ARG2-of (d / destroy-01
                              :degree (m / mass)))
                  :ARG2 (a / and
                        :op1 (h / hand
                              :part-of (t / terrorist))
                        :op2 (h2 / hand
                              :part-of (p / person
                                    :ARG0-of (m3 / market-01
                                          :mod (b / black))))))
            :ARG1-of (i / increase-01)))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_0971.6 ::date 2013-07-17T19:19:39 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt A resolution adopted unanimously by the United Nations Council on April 25, 2008 calls on all States to fully implement a 2004 resolution that closed a loophole in global efforts to prevent the proliferation of nuclear, chemical and biological weapons.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_0971_6.txt
(c / call-05
      :ARG0 (r / resolution
            :ARG1-of (a / adopt-01
                  :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations" :op3 "Council"))
                  :mod (u / unanimous)
                  :time (d / date-entity :day 25 :month 4 :year 2008)))
      :ARG1 (s / state
            :mod (a2 / all)
            :ARG0-of (i / implement-01
                  :ARG1 (r2 / resolution
                        :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2004)
                        :ARG0-of (c2 / close-01
                              :ARG1 (l / loophole
                                    :mod (e / effort
                                          :mod (g / globe)
                                          :purpose (p / prevent-01
                                                :ARG1 (p2 / proliferate-01
                                                      :ARG0 (a3 / and
                                                            :op1 (w / weapon
                                                                  :mod (n2 / nucleus))
                                                            :op2 (w2 / weapon
                                                                  :mod (c3 / chemical))
                                                            :op3 (w3 / weapon
                                                                  :mod (b / biology)))))))))
                  :degree (f / full))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_0971.7 ::date 2013-07-17T19:59:47 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The resolution requires all 192 United Nations Member States to adopt laws to prevent terrorists, black marketeers and other non-State actors from manufacturing, acquiring or trafficking in nuclear, biological or chemical weapons or the materials to make them.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_0971_7.txt
(r / require-01
      :ARG0 (r2 / resolution)
      :ARG1 (a / adopt-01
            :ARG0 (s / state :quant 192
                  :mod (a2 / all)
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations"))
                        :ARG2 (m / member)))
            :ARG1 (l / law
                  :ARG0-of (p / prevent-01
                        :ARG1 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (t / terrorist)
                              :op2 (p3 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (m6 / market-01
                                          :mod (b / black)))
                              :op3 (p2 / person
                                    :mod (s2 / state :polarity -)
                                    :ARG0-of (a4 / act-01)
                                    :mod (o4 / other)))
                        :ARG2 (o2 / or
                              :op1 (m3 / manufacture-01
                                    :ARG1 (o3 / or
                                          :op1 (w / weapon
                                                :mod (n2 / nucleus))
                                          :op2 (w2 / weapon
                                                :mod (b2 / biology))
                                          :op3 (w3 / weapon
                                                :mod (c / chemical))
                                          :op4 (m4 / material
                                                :ARG2-of (m5 / make-01
                                                      :ARG1 o3))))
                              :op2 (a5 / acquire-01
                                    :ARG1 o3)
                              :op3 (t2 / traffic-00
                                    :ARG1 o3))))))

                  :mod (s / some)
                  :ARG1-of (n2 / name-01 :polarity -))

                        :purpose (i / implement-01
                              :ARG1 (r3 / resolution
                                    :mod (d2 / due
                                          :time (d / date-entity :month 10 :year 2004))))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_1111.6 ::date 2013-07-17T21:24:29 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_1111_6.txt

      :ARG0 (r / resolution

            :mod (a / all))
      :ARG2 (i / implement-01
            :ARG1 (r2 / resolution
                  :ARG1-of (a2 / adopt-01
                        :ARG0 o
                        :time (d / date-entity :month 4 :year 2000 :day 4))
                  :ARG0-of (r3 / require-01
                        :ARG1 (a3 / adopt-01
                              :ARG1 (l / law
                                    :ARG0-of (p / prevent-01
                                          :ARG1 (a5 / acquire-01

                                                      :ARG0-of (a6 / act-01))
                                                :ARG1 (o2 / or
                                                      :op1 (w / weapon
                                                            :mod (n2 / nucleus))
                                                      :op2 (w2 / weapon
                                                            :mod (c2 / chemical))
                                                      :op3 (w3 / weapon
                                                            :mod (b / biology)))))))
                        :ARG2 (s2 / state :quant 192
                              :mod (a4 / all)
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (o3 / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nation"))
                                    :ARG2 (m2 / member)))))
            :mod (f / full)))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_1111.7 ::date 2013-07-17T22:56:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (r / resolution

            :ARG0 (c / country

                  :ARG1 (e / effort
                        :poss (n4 / nation
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG2 (m / member)))
                        :purpose (a / adopt-01

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_1111.8 ::date 2013-07-17T23:07:06 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

  :mod (d2 / due
         :time (d / date-entity
                 :month 10
                 :year 2004)
         :destination (o / organization
                        :name (n / name
                                :op1 "United"
                                :op2 "Nations"))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_1111.9 ::date 2013-07-17T23:09:39 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_1111_9.txt
(s / stress-01
      :ARG0 (r / resolution
            :mod (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "Security" :op2 "Council"))
            :time (d / date-entity :day 25 :month 4 :year 2008))
      :ARG1 (n / need-01
            :ARG1 (e / enhance-01
                  :ARG1 (c / coordinate-01
                        :ARG1 (a / and

                                    :mod (n3 / nation))
                              :op2 (e3 / effort
                                    :mod (r2 / region))
                              :op3 (e4 / effort
                                    :mod (i / international))
                              :purpose (s3 / strengthen-01
                                    :ARG1 (r3 / respond-01
                                          :ARG1 (c2 / challenge-01
                                                :ARG2 (k / keep-04
                                                      :ARG1 (w / weapon)
                                                      :ARG2 (a2 / and
                                                            :op1 (t / terrorist)
                                                            :op2 (t2 / threaten-01
                                                                  :ARG2 (s5 / security
                                                                        :mod (i2 / international)))))
                                                :mod (s4 / serious))
                                          :mod (g2 / globe))))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_1111.10 ::date 2013-07-17T23:42:39 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

            :ARG0-of (c / close-01
                  :ARG1 (l / loophole
                        :mod (e / effort
                              :mod (g / globe)

                                    :ARG1 (p2 / proliferate-01
                                          :ARG0 (w / weapon

                                                      :degree (m / mass)))))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_1111.11 ::date 2013-07-17T23:48:20 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt International treaties targeted weapons proliferation by Governments until Resolution 1540 was adopted in 040000 there was no legal instrument to prevent terrorists, criminal scientists, black marketeers and other non-State actors from obtaining weapons of mass destruction.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 5, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_1111_11.txt
(t / target-01
      :ARG0 (t2 / treaty
            :mod (i / international))
      :ARG1 (p / proliferate-01
            :ARG0 (w / weapon)
            :prep-by (g / government-organization))
      :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (i2 / instrument :polarity -
                  :mod (l2 / legal)
                  :ARG0-of (p2 / prevent-01
                        :ARG1 (a / and
                              :op1 (t3 / terrorist)
                              :op2 (s / scientist
                                    :mod (c2 / crime))
                              :op3 (m2 / marketeer
                                    :mod (b / black))
                              :op4 (p3 / person
                                    :mod (s2 / state :polarity -)
                                    :ARG0-of (a2 / act-01)
                                    :mod (o / other)))
                        :ARG2 (o2 / obtain-01
                              :ARG1 (w2 / weapon
                                    :ARG2-of (d2 / destroy-01
                                          :degree (m / mass)))))))
      :time (u / until
            :op1 (a3 / adopt-01
                  :ARG1 (l / law :name (n2 / name :op1 "Resolution" :op2 "1540"))
                  :time (d / date-entity :year 2004))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_1111.12 ::date 2013-07-18T19:30:24 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Resolution 1540 was introduced as the International Atomic Energy Agency was investigating a vast black market in nuclear equipment and technology.
# ::save-date Thu Jul 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_1111_12.txt
(i / introduce-01
  :ARG1 (l / law
          :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Resolution"
                  :op2 "1540"))
  :time (i2 / investigate-01
          :ARG0 (o2 / organization
                  :name (n3 / name
                          :op1 "International"
                          :op2 "Atomic"
                          :op3 "Energy"
                          :op4 "Agency"))
          :ARG1 (m / market-01
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                          :op1 (e / equipment
                                 :mod (n4 / nucleus))
                          :op2 (t / technology
                                 :mod n4))
                  :mod (v / vast)
                  :mod (b / black))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_1111.13 ::date 2013-07-18T20:22:42 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The black market investigation was encouraged by Pakistan's admission in 040200 that Pakistan's leading nuclear scientist had passed technology to Iran, Libya and North Korea.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_1111_13.txt
(e / encourage-01
      :ARG0 (a / admit-01
            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Pakistan"))
            :ARG1 (p / pass-05
                  :ARG0 (s / scientist
                        :mod (n6 / nucleus)
                        :ARG0-of (l / lead-02)
                        :mod c)
                  :ARG1 (t / technology)
                  :ARG2 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Iran"))
                        :op2 (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Libya"))
                        :op3 (c5 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "North" :op2 "Korea"))))
            :time (d / date-entity :month 2 :year 2004))
      :ARG2 (i / investigate-01
            :ARG1 (m / market-01
                  :mod (b / black))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_1111.14 ::date 2013-07-18T23:04:41 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Pakistan's leading nuclear scientist, was Abdul Qadeer Khan.
# ::save-date Wed Jul 24, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_1111_14.txt
(s / scientist
      :mod (n3 / nucleus)
      :ARG0-of (l / lead-01)
      :poss (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Pakistan"))
      :domain (p / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Abdul" :op2 "Qadeer" :op3 "Khan")))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_1111.15 ::date 2013-07-18T23:06:53 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Resolution 1540 requires all countries to adopt laws to prevent non-State actors from manufacturing, acquiring or trafficking in nuclear, biological or chemical weapons, the materials to make them, and the missiles and other systems to deliver them.
# ::save-date Thu Sep 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080425_1111_15.txt
(r / require-01
      :ARG0 (l / law :name (n2 / name :op1 "Resolution" :op2 "1540"))
      :ARG1 (a / adopt-01
            :ARG1 (l2 / law
                  :ARG0-of (p / prevent-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person
                              :mod (s / state :polarity -)
                              :ARG0-of (a3 / act-01))
                        :ARG2 (o / or
                              :op1 (m / manufacture-01
                                    :ARG1 (a5 / and
                                          :op1 (w / weapon
                                                :mod (n / nucleus))
                                          :op2 (w2 / weapon
                                                :mod (b / biology))
                                          :op3 (w3 / weapon
                                                :mod (c2 / chemical))
                                          :op4 (m2 / material
                                                :ARG2-of (m4 / make-01
                                                      :ARG1 (a7 / and
                                                            :op1 w
                                                            :op2 w2
                                                            :op3 w3)))
                                          :op5 (a6 / and
                                                :op1 (m3 / missile)
                                                :op2 (s2 / system
                                                      :ARG0-of (d2 / deliver-01
                                                            :ARG1 m3)
                                                      :mod (o2 / other)))))
                              :op2 (a4 / acquire-01
                                    :ARG1 a5)
                              :op3 (t / traffic-00
                                    :ARG1 a5)))))
      :ARG2 (c / country
            :quant (a2 / all)))

      :ARG2 (c / country

                                :op2 "1540"
                                :op3 "Committee")))

                 :op1 (d2 / date-entity
                        :day 25
                        :month 4
                        :year 2011)))
  :op2 (c / call-12
         :ARG0 r
         :ARG1 (s / state
                 :mod (a4 / all)
                 :ARG0-of (p / present-01

                                            :op1 (s3 / step-01

                                                                         :ARG0 s)))
                                            :purpose (i2 / implement-01
                                                       :ARG1 (l / law
                                                               :name (n3 / name
                                                                       :op1 "Resolution"
                                                                       :op2 "1540"))))
                                    :ord (o4 / ordinal-entity
                                           :value 1))
                            :polarity -
                            :mod (y / yet)))
         :ARG2 (s2 / submit-01
                 :ARG1 (r3 / report-01
                         :mod (s4 / such))
                 :ARG2 (o2 / organization
                         :name (n2 / name

                                 :op2 "Committee"))
                 :manner (d3 / delay-01
                           :polarity -))

                                          :mod (i2 / international)))))
                  :mod (l4 / long-term))))

  :ARG1 (c2 / country
          :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "China"))
  :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
             :ARG0 (e / effort
                     :purpose (a / and
                                :op1 (m / modernize-01
                                       :ARG0 c2
                                       :ARG1 (c / capable-41
                                               :ARG1 c2
                                               :ARG2 (w / weapon
                                                       :mod (n3 / nucleus))))
                                :op2 (e2 / expand-01
                                       :ARG1 c)
                                :op3 (i / improve-01
                                       :ARG1 c)))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080508_0562.12 ::date 2013-07-26T03:07:02 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :ARG0 c4

                        :mod (n5 / nucleus))
                  :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity :value 1)
                  :prep-in (c5 / conflict-01))
            :op2 (p / power
                  :mod w
                  :ARG1-of (i / include-91
                        :ARG2 (p2 / power :quant 5
                              :mod w
                              :mod (m / main)))
                  :mod (s2 / small
                        :degree (m2 / most))

                              :ARG2 (m3 / missile

                                    :quant (o3 / over :op1 100
                                          :mod (j / just))))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080513_0501.9 ::date 2013-07-18T03:07:14 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The legislation is primarily aimed at permitting military use of Japan's civilian-controlled spy satellite network for defense as defined by the pacifist constitution.
# ::save-date Fri Jul 19, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080513_0501_9.txt
(a / aim-02
      :ARG1 (l / legislation)
      :ARG2 (p / permit-01
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 (m / military)
                  :ARG1 (n3 / network
                        :poss (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Japan"))
                        :consist-of (s / satellite
                              :instrument-of (s2 / spy-01))
                        :ARG1-of (c3 / control-01
                              :ARG0 (c4 / civilian)))
                  :ARG2 (d / defense)))
      :prep-as (d2 / define-01
            :ARG0 (c5 / constitution
                  :mod (p2 / pacifist)))
      :mod (p3 / primarily))

                  :mod (s2 / space))
            :ARG2 (i / importance
                  :ARG1-of (i2 / increase-01))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080513_0501.12 ::date 2013-07-18T03:23:07 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                              :mod (s2 / satellite))

                              :mod (o / other)))

                  :mod (p3 / potential))))

      :ARG0 (a3 / and
            :op1 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Estonia"))
                        :ARG2 (c9 / chief
                              :mod (d / defense))))
            :op2 (p3 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Latvia"))
                        :ARG2 c9))
            :op3 (p4 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c3 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Lithuania"))
                        :ARG2 c9))
            :op4 (p5 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h4 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c4 / country :name (n5 / name :op1 "Germany"))
                        :ARG2 c9))
            :op5 (p6 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h5 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c5 / country :name (n6 / name :op1 "Italy"))
                        :ARG2 c9))
            :op6 (p7 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h6 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c6 / country :name (n7 / name :op1 "Spain"))
                        :ARG2 c9))
            :op7 (p8 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h7 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (c7 / country :name (n8 / name :op1 "Slovakia"))
                        :ARG2 c9)))
      :ARG1 (a / agree-01
            :ARG0 a3
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (p / provide-01
                        :ARG1 (s2 / staff)
                        :ARG2 (c8 / center))
                  :op2 (f / fund-01
                        :ARG1 c8))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080514_0575.12 ::date 2013-07-18T06:13:14 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The United States will join the project as an observer and other NATO nations may join later.
# ::save-date Thu Jul 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080514_0575_12.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (j / join-02
            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))
            :ARG1 (p / project)
            :prep-as (o / observe-01
                  :ARG0 c))
      :op2 (p2 / possible
            :domain (j2 / join-02
                  :ARG0 (n2 / nation
                        :mod (m2 / military :name (n3 / name :op1 "NATO"))
                        :mod (o2 / other))
                  :time (l / late
                        :degree (m / more)))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080514_0575.13 ::date 2013-07-18T06:16:59 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

(i / issue
      :domain (s / sign-02
            :ARG1 (a / agreement))
      :mod (p / peripheral)

            :ARG0 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG2 (c / chief
                              :mod (s2 / staff
                                    :mod (d / defense)
                                    :source (c2 / country :quant 26
                                          :ARG1-of (a2 / ally-01)
                                          :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                                :ARG1 (m3 / military :name (n3 / name :op1 "NATO"))
                                                :ARG2 (m / member)))))))))

                  :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Soviet" :op2 "Union"))))
      :mod (a / also))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080514_0575.17 ::date 2013-07-18T07:11:36 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

      :op1 (r / research-01
            :ARG0 (s / staff
                  :consist-of (p2 / person :quant 30
                        :ARG0-of (s2 / specialize-01)))
            :ARG1 (w / warfare
                  :mod (c / cyber)))
      :op2 (t / train-01
            :ARG1 w
            :ARG2 s)
      :op3 (p / prepare-02
            :ARG1 s
            :ARG2 (a2 / assist-01
                  :ARG1 (c3 / country
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (m3 / military :name (n2 / name :op1 "NATO"))
                              :ARG2 (m / member)))
                  :ARG2 (r2 / respond-01
                        :ARG1 (a3 / attack-01
                              :mod (c2 / cyber)
                              :mod (f / future)
                              :mod (a4 / any))))))

                        :ARG1 (m2 / military :name (n4 / name :op1 "NATO"))))

                  :ARG1 c5)
            :time (u / until
                  :op1 (a / after
                        :op1 (a2 / attack-01
                              :time (d4 / date-entity :year 2007)
                              :mod (c7 / cyber))))))

      :domain (a / attack-01
            :mod (c / cyber)))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080514_1125.18 ::date 2013-07-20T00:19:44 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The cyber attacks followed a dispute over the relocation of a Soviet war memorial in Estonia's capital.
# ::save-date Sat Jul 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080514_1125_18.txt
(f / follow-01
      :ARG1 (a / attack-01
            :mod (c3 / cyber))
      :ARG2 (d / dispute-01
            :ARG2 (r / relocate-01
                  :ARG1 (m / memorial
                        :mod (w / war)
                        :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Soviet" :op2 "Union")))

                        :instrument (n4 / needle
                              :ARG1-of (i2 / infect-01))))
            :ARG1-of (c4 / cause-01

                              :ARG2 (d2 / disease :name (n2 / name :op1 "AIDS")))))
            :frequency (r2 / rate-entity-91
                  :ARG2 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                        :unit (y / year)))))

                  :ARG0 p

                                          :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                                                :ARG1-of (t3 / threaten-01

      :prep-as (p3 / person
            :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG3 (c2 / command-02
                        :ARG1 (f / force
                              :ARG1-of (a / arm-01)

            :ARG1 (b2 / base)
            :frequency (r / rare)))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080515_0931.31 ::date 2013-07-21T01:08:20 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Yuri dolgoruky is the first in a series of new nuclear submarines to be commissioned this year but the bulava nuclear-armed missile developed to equip the submarine has failed tests and the deployment prospects are uncertain.
# ::save-date Tue Aug 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080515_0931_31.txt
(c3 / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (c / commission-01
            :ARG1 (p / product :name (n / name :op1 "Yuri" :op2 "Dolgoruky")
                  :mod (f2 / first
                        :ARG1-of (i / include-91
                              :ARG2 (s / series
                                    :mod (s2 / submarine
                                          :mod (n2 / nucleus)
                                          :mod (n3 / new))))))
            :time (y / year
                  :mod (t / this)))
      :ARG2 (a / and
            :op1 (f / fail-01
                  :ARG0 (m2 / missile :name (n4 / name :op1 "Bulava")
                        :ARG1-of (d2 / develop-02
                              :purpose (e / equip-01
                                    :ARG0 (m / missile)
                                    :ARG1 (s3 / submarine)))
                        :ARG1-of (a2 / arm-01
                              :ARG2 (n5 / nucleus)))
                  :ARG1 (t2 / test-01))
            :op2 (c2 / certain :polarity -
                  :domain (p2 / prospect
                        :mod (d / deploy-01)))))

                  :mod (f / former)))

                        :ARG1 (c2 / cluster-01

                                    :mod (d4 / desert)))))
            :ARG2 (a3 / add-05
                  :ARG1 (m2 / missile
                        :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 4))
                  :ARG2 p))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 10 :month 7 :year 2008))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080710_1336.7 ::date 2013-07-18T06:48:26 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 20080710 the image was replaced with an image of the same 3 missiles in the previous photo but in place of the 4th missile is a grounded missile and what appears to be a vehicle nearby.
# ::save-date Thu Jul 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080710_1336_7.txt

      :ARG1 (i / image)
      :ARG2 (i2 / image
            :mod (m / missile :quant 3
                  :mod (s / same)
                  :prep-in (p / photo
                        :mod (p2 / previous))))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 10 :month 7 :year 2008)
      :concession (r2 / replace-01
            :ARG1 (m2 / missile
                  :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 4))
            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (m3 / missile
                        :ARG1-of (g / ground-01))
                  :op2 (v / vehicle
                        :ARG1-of (a2 / appear-02)
                        :location (n / nearby)))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080710_1336.8 ::date 2013-07-18T06:55:57 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

            :op1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))
            :op2 (c2 / country
                  :ARG1-of (a4 / ally-01
                        :ARG2 c)))

            :ARG0 (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Iran"))
            :ARG1 (a3 / arm
                  :mod (n4 / nucleus))))

                  :mod (p2 / power

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080728_0937.23 ::date 2013-07-26T06:18:16 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri Jul 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080912_0932_9.txt
(c2 / coordinate-01
      :ARG1 (r / raid-01)
      :ARG2 (c3 / crack-06
            :location (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Norway")
                  :location-of (a / arrest-01
                        :ARG1 (p / person :quant 3
                              :ARG2-of (s / suspect-01)
                              :mod (a2 / another))
                        :ARG2 (t / thing
                              :ARG0-of (g / ground-01)
                              :ARG1-of (r2 / resemble-01))))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20080912_0932.12 ::date 2013-07-26T15:49:46 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri Jul 26, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20080912_0932_12.txt
(s / system
      :domain (h / hawalas)
      :mod (p / paper :polarity -)
      :ARG1-of (b / base-02
            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (t / trust-02)
                  :op2 (a2 / agree-01
                        :manner (o / oral))))
      :ARG1-of (u / use-01
            :mod (c3 / common)
            :location (a3 / and
                  :op1 (w / world-region :name (n / name :op1 "Middle" :op2 "East"))
                  :op2 (l / location
                        :part-of (c / continent :name (n2 / name :op1 "Asia")))
                  :op3 (l2 / location
                        :part-of (c2 / continent :name (n3 / name :op1 "Africa"))))))

                  :degree (v / very))

                  :ARG0 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (l3 / law)
                        :op2 (o2 / order)
                        :mod (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Sweden"))))
            :domain (d2 / detain-01
                  :ARG1 (c2 / client
                        :ARG1-of (r / represent-01
                              :ARG0 l))
                  :duration (t2 / time
                        :mod (l2 / long
                              :mod (s2 / such)))
                  :ARG1-of (h / have-concession-91
                        :ARG2 (w / weak-41
                              :ARG1 (t3 / thing
                                    :ARG0-of (e / evidence-01
                                          :prep-against c2)))))))

                        :ARG1 (d2 / date-entity :year 2008)
                        :season (s2 / summer)))))

      :ARG0 (w / war-01

      :ARG1 (p / plan-01
            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Russian" :op2 "Federation"))

                  :op1 (u / upgrade-02
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 (t / thing
                              :poss c
                              :mod (n4 / nucleus)
                              :ARG0-of (d / deter-01)))
                  :op2 (m / modernize-01
                        :ARG0 c
                        :ARG1 (m2 / military)))))

      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Dmitry" :op2 "Medvedev")
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (p2 / president)))
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (u / upgrade-02
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :mod (n4 / nucleus)
                        :poss (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Russian" :op2 "Federation"))
                        :ARG0-of (d / deter-01)))
            :op2 (m / modernize-01
                  :ARG1 (f / force
                        :ARG1-of (a2 / arm-01)
                        :poss c))))

                              :ARG2-of (d / defend-01

                              :mod (n2 / new)))
                  :op2 (b2 / begin-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / produce-01
                              :ARG1 (s / ship
                                    :mod (w / war)
                                    :ARG2-of (i2 / include-01
                                          :ARG1 (s2 / submarine
                                                :mod (n3 / nucleus))))
                              :extent (s5 / scale
                                    :mod (l / large))))))
      :ARG2 (u / upgrade-02
            :mod (t / this)))

      :time (a / after
            :op1 (e / exercise
                  :mod (m / military)

                        :mod (s2 / south)))))

# ::snt The Court considered ouarab to be the natural, legitimate and operational successor of Bourada.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 2, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20081023_1213_20.txt
(c / consider-01
  :ARG0 (c2 / court)
  :ARG1 (s / succeed-02
          :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                          :op1 "Ouarab"))
          :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                          :op1 "Bourada"))
          :mod (n4 / natural)
          :mod (l / legitimacy)
          :mod (o2 / operation)))

            :domain (p3 / parole-01

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20081031_1096.4 ::date 2013-07-29T22:16:50 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt On 081031 some United Nation's General Assembly's member nations voted to move ahead with creating an unprecedented treaty regulating the global arms trade despite United States opposition.
# ::save-date Mon Sep 2, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20081031_1096_4.txt
(v / vote-01
  :ARG0 (n4 / nation
          :mod (s / some)
          :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                     :ARG1 (o3 / organization
                             :name (n5 / name
                                     :op1 "United"
                                     :op2 "Nations"
                                     :op3 "General"
                                     :op4 "Assembly"))
                     :ARG2 (m / member)))
  :ARG1 (m2 / move-01
          :ARG1 (c2 / create-01
                  :ARG1 (t / treaty
                          :mod (p / precedent
                                 :polarity -)
                          :ARG0-of (r / regulate-01
                                     :ARG1 (t2 / trade-01
                                             :ARG1 (a2 / arm)
                                             :mod (g / globe)))))
          :ARG2 (a / ahead))
  :time (d / date-entity
          :day 31
          :month 10
          :year 2008)
  :concession (o / oppose-01
                :ARG0 (c / country
                        :name (n / name
                                :op1 "United"
                                :op2 "States"))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20081031_1096.5 ::date 2013-07-29T22:31:20 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Sat Aug 10, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20081031_1096_5.txt

      :ARG0 (a / and
            :op1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Britain"))

                  :mod (o2 / other)
                  :ARG0-of (s / support-01
                        :ARG1 (t / treaty
                              :ARG0-of (r / regulate-01
                                    :ARG1 (t2 / trade-01
                                          :ARG1 (a2 / arm)
                                          :mod (g / globe)))
                              :mod (p / precedent :polarity -)))))
      :ARG1 (e / endorse-01
            :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations" :op3 "General" :op4 "Assembly"))
            :ARG1 (m / move-01
                  :ARG0 a
                  :ARG1 (c3 / create-01
                        :ARG1 t)
                  :ARG2 (f / forward))
            :ARG0-of (o3 / overwhelm-01))
      :time (d / date-entity :day 31 :month 10 :year 2008)
      :concession (o4 / oppose-01
            :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "United" :op2 "States"))))

                           :op1 "Finland"))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20081031_1096.20 ::date 2013-07-30T22:39:09 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

  :ARG0 (p3 / person

                  :op2 "Rocca")
          :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                     :ARG1 (c / country
                             :name (n / name
                                     :op1 "United"
                                     :op2 "States"))
                     :ARG2 (d / diplomat)))
  :ARG1 (w2 / way
          :mod (o / only)
          :instrument-of (a / achieve-01
                           :ARG1 (m / mechanism
                                   :mod (i / international)
                                   :instrument-of (c2 / control-01
                                                    :ARG1 (t / trade-01
                                                            :ARG1 (a2 / arm
                                                                    :mod (c3 / conventional))))
                                   :mod (e / effective)
                                   :ARG1-of (b / balance-01)))
          :domain (p2 / proceed-01
                    :ARG1-of (b2 / base-02
                               :ARG2 (c4 / consensus)))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20081031_1096.28 ::date 2013-07-31T01:54:42 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                                  :ARG1 (c2 / country
                                          :ARG0-of (e / export-01
                                                     :ARG1 (a2 / arm))
                                          :quant (a3 / all)
                                          :mod (m / major))

                                          :ARG0 c2

                                                  :topic (t2 / trade-01
                                                           :ARG1 a2)))))
          :op2 (l / legitimize-01
                 :ARG0 (t3 / treaty
                         :topic (t4 / trade-01
                                  :ARG1 a2)
                         :mod (w3 / weak))
                 :ARG1 (s3 / standard
                         :mod (i / international)
                         :ARG1-of (b / base-02
                                    :ARG2 (d / denominator
                                            :mod (c3 / common)
                                            :mod (l2 / low
                                                   :degree (m2 / most))
                                            :ARG0-of (a4 / address-02
                                                       :ARG1 (p3 / problem
                                                               :topic (t5 / transfer-01
                                                                        :ARG1 a2
                                                                        :mod (l3 / law
                                                                               :polarity -)
                                                                        :mod (r / responsible
                                                                               :polarity -)))
                                                       :polarity -)))))))

                                          :ARG1 (e / environment))))))
            :ARG3 (c5 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 a2
                  :ARG1 (d2 / delay-01))))

# ::id PROXY_APW_ENG_20081127_1149.4 ::date 2013-07-31T03:56:39 ::snt-type summary ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt An institute for public policy research report said there are 27 weak states that pose a threat to Britain's national security as the States could provide bases for terrorists.
# ::save-date Mon Aug 5, 2013 ::file PROXY_APW_ENG_20081127_1149_4.txt
(s / say-01
  :ARG0 (r / report-01
          :ARG2 (i / institute
                  :mod (p / policy
                         :mod (p2 / public))
                  :domain (r2 / research-01)))
  :ARG1 (t / threaten-01
          :ARG0 (s2 / state
                  :mod (w / weak)
                  :quant 27)
          :ARG2 (s3 / security
                  :mod (n2 / nation)
                  :poss (c / country
                          :name (n / name
                                  :op1 "Britain")))
          :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                     :ARG0 (p3 / possible

# ::id PROXY_CNA_ENG_20080128_0016.9 ::date 2013-07-28T10:00:51 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The COA successfully promoted a total of 139 applications for technological transfer and intellectual property rights in 2007 which is an increase of 50 percent from the average of 90 cases per year from 2002 to 2006.
# ::save-date Wed Sep 18, 2013 ::file PROXY_CNA_ENG_20080128_0016_9.txt
(p / promote-02
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n / name :op1 "COA"))
      :ARG1 (a / apply-01
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (t / transfer-01
                        :ARG1 (t4 / technology))
                  :op2 (r / right
                        :mod (p2 / property
                              :mod (i / intellectual))))

                  :ARG2 139
                  :ARG0-of (m / mean-01
                        :ARG1 (i2 / increase-01
                              :ARG2 (p3 / percentage-entity :value 50)
                              :ARG3 (r2 / rate-entity-91
                                    :ARG1 (c / case :quant 90)
                                    :ARG2 (t3 / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                                          :unit (y / year)))
                              :time (d2 / date-interval
                                    :op1 (d3 / date-entity :year 2002)
                                    :op2 (d4 / date-entity :year 2006))))))
      :manner (s / successful)
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2007))

                  :mod (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Taiwan"))
                  :mod (n3 / new))

                  :ARG2 (p / percentage-entity :value 50)

                              :unit d2

# ::id PROXY_CNA_ENG_20080216_0006.18 ::date 2013-07-28T18:35:04 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-15 ::preferred

# ::save-date Mon Aug 5, 2013 ::file PROXY_CNA_ENG_20080216_0006_18.txt
(a / approve-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n / name :op1 "Government"))
      :ARG1 (a2 / apply-01
            :ARG0 (c / company :name (n2 / name :op1 "Taiwan" :op2 "Semiconductor" :op3 "Manufacturing" :op4 "Co."))
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (t / technology
                        :instrument-of (m / manufacture-01
                              :ARG1 (c2 / chip
                                    :mod (d / distance-quantity :quant 0.18
                                          :unit (m2 / micro)))))
                  :location (f / foundry
                        :mod (w / wafer)
                        :location (c3 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "China"))))))

# ::id PROXY_CNA_ENG_20080408_0041.5 ::date 2013-07-28T13:41:26 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-15 ::preferred

                  :ARG1-of (p / propose-01
                        :ARG0 (c / company
                              :mod (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))
                              :ARG0-of (m / manufacture-01)))
                  :mod c2))
      :time (d / date-entity :year 2008 :month 4 :day 8))

# ::id PROXY_CNA_ENG_20080408_0041.6 ::date 2013-07-28T13:51:28 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-15 ::preferred

                        :op3 (c4 / company :name (n3 / name :op1 "IC" :op2 "Assembly" :op3 "Company" :op4 "Sigurd" :op5 "Corp."))
                        :op4 (c5 / company :name (n4 / name :op1 "Siliconware" :op2 "Precision" :op3 "Industries")))))
      :op2 (i2 / invest-01
            :ARG0 a3
