                  :op1 (p / package-01
                        :ARG1 (c / circuit
                              :ARG1-of (i3 / integrate-01)))
                  :op2 (t / test-01
                        :ARG1 c))))

# ::id PROXY_CNA_ENG_20080408_0041.7 ::date 2013-07-28T14:16:12 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-15 ::preferred

      :ARG0 (c / company)

                  :unit (d / dollar
                        :mod (c2 / country :name (n / name :op1 "US"))))
            :op2 (m2 / monetary-quantity :quant 20000000
                  :unit d)
            :op3 (m3 / monetary-quantity :quant 6700000
                  :unit d)
            :op4 (m4 / monetary-quantity :quant 50000000
                  :unit d))
      :manner (r / respective))

# ::id PROXY_CNA_ENG_20080408_0041.8 ::date 2013-07-28T14:44:21 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                  :mod (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "US")))

# ::id PROXY_CNA_ENG_20080408_0041.9 ::date 2013-07-28T18:59:57 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The moea determined in a meeting on 8 April 2008 that the investment proposals met the clauses in the China Investment procedure issued by the ministry's Investment Commission.
# ::save-date Sun Aug 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_CNA_ENG_20080408_0041_9.txt
(d / determine-01
      :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n / name :op1 "MOEA"))
      :ARG1 (m2 / meet-01
            :ARG0 (t / thing
                  :ARG1-of (p / propose-01
                        :ARG2 (i / invest-01)))
            :ARG1 (c / clause
                  :part-of (p2 / procedure
                        :instrument-of (i2 / invest-01)
                        :mod (c2 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "China"))
                        :ARG1-of (i3 / issue-01
                              :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "Investment" :op2 "Commission")
                                    :poss (m3 / ministry))))))
      :time (m / meet-03
            :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2008 :month 4 :day 8)))

# ::id PROXY_CNA_ENG_20080408_0041.10 ::date 2013-07-28T18:40:54 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-15 ::preferred
# ::snt The Investment Commission's Executive Secretary Fan Liang-Tung stated the investment procedure aims to ensure Taiwan's investments in China will not harm Taiwan's industries and economy such as by leaking key technologies to the mainland.
# ::save-date Mon Aug 5, 2013 ::file PROXY_CNA_ENG_20080408_0041_10.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person :name (n / name :op1 "Fan" :op2 "Liang-Tung")
            :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (o / organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "Investment" :op2 "Commission"))
                  :ARG2 (s2 / secretary
                        :mod (e / executive))))
      :ARG1 (a / aim-01
            :ARG0 (p / procedure
                  :mod (i / invest-01))
            :ARG1 (e2 / ensure-01
                  :ARG1 (h / harm-01 :polarity -
                        :ARG0 (t / thing
                              :ARG1-of (i2 / invest-01
                                    :ARG0 (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Taiwan"))
                                    :ARG2 (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "China"))))
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (i3 / industry
                                    :poss c)
                              :op2 (e3 / economy
                                    :poss c))
                        :example (l / leak-01
                              :ARG1 (t2 / technology
                                    :mod (k / key))
                              :beneficiary (m / mainland))))))

# ::id PROXY_CNA_ENG_20080408_0041.11 ::date 2013-07-28T18:51:53 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-15 ::preferred
# ::snt Under the procedure investment plans require approval from the moea if the plans involve a single investment that exceeds 100 million US dollars, the company's total investment in China reaches 200 million US dollars, or the investment could transfer core local industries' technologies to China.
# ::save-date Mon Aug 5, 2013 ::file PROXY_CNA_ENG_20080408_0041_11.txt
(r / require-01
      :ARG0 (p / plan-01
            :ARG1 (i / invest-01))
      :ARG1 (a / approve-01
            :ARG0 (g / government-organization :name (n / name :op1 "MOEA")))
      :prep-under (p2 / procedure)
      :condition (o / or
            :op1 (i2 / involve-01
                  :ARG1 (i3 / invest-01
                        :ARG1 (m / monetary-quantity
                              :ARG0-of (e / exceed-01
                                    :ARG2 (m3 / monetary-quantity :quant 100000000
                                          :unit (d / dollar
                                                :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "US"))))))
                        :mod (s / single))
                  :ARG2 (t / thing
                        :ARG1-of (p3 / plan-01)))
            :op2 (r2 / reach-01
                  :ARG0 (m4 / monetary-quantity
                        :ARG1-of (i4 / invest-01
                              :ARG0 (c4 / company)
                              :ARG2 (c2 / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "China")))
                        :ARG1-of (t2 / total-01))
                  :ARG1 (m2 / monetary-quantity :quant 200000000
                        :unit d))
            :op3 (p4 / possible
                  :op1 (t5 / transfer-01
                        :ARG0 m4
                        :ARG1 (t6 / technology
                              :poss (i5 / industry
                                    :mod (c3 / core)
                                    :mod (l / local)))
                        :ARG2 c2))))

# ::id PROXY_CNA_ENG_20080408_0041.12 ::date 2013-07-28T19:12:03 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                                    :unit i3)
                              :mod (t / transistor
                                    :mod (f / film
                                          :mod (t2 / thin)))
                              :mod (p4 / product :name (n2 / name :op1 "TFT")))

                              :ARG1-of (i4 / integrate-01))))

                  :mod (c / core))
            :manner (m / main)))

# ::id PROXY_CNA_ENG_20080408_0041.13 ::date 2013-07-28T19:23:54 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Sun Aug 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_CNA_ENG_20080408_0041_13.txt

      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "Commission"))

            :ARG1-of (w / write-01)
            :ARG2-of (i2 / include-01
                  :ARG1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (p2 / plan-01
                              :ARG1 (f / finance))
                        :op2 (i3 / information
                              :topic (a4 / and
                                    :op1 (t2 / transfer-01
                                          :ARG1 (t3 / technology))
                                    :op2 (m2 / monetary-quantity
                                          :ARG1-of (i4 / invest-01
                                                :ARG0 c3
                                                :mod (d3 / domestic)))
                                    :op3 (e / employ-01))))))
      :time (a / after
            :op1 (m / meet-03
                  :time (d / date-entity :year 2008 :month 4 :day 8)))
      :purpose (a2 / assess-01
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :ARG1-of (p / plan-01)
                  :ARG0-of (c / contain-01
                        :ARG1 (c2 / commit-01
                              :ARG1 (c3 / company
                                    :mod (e2 / each))
                              :ARG2 (t4 / term
                                    :mod (i / invest-01
                                          :ARG0 c3)))))
            :mod (f2 / further)))

                  :ARG0 m3

                              :mod (s2 / scale

  :ARG0 (c / country
          :name (n / name

                  :ARG0 c

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030.6 ::date 2013-08-01T17:28:44 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 20080726 Iranian President Mahmoud ahmadinejad stated to scholars in the northeastern city of mashbad that Iran had expanded its arsenal of centrifuges producing enriched uranium to over 5000.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 3, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030_6.txt
(s / state-01
  :ARG0 (p / person
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Mahmoud"
                  :op2 "Ahmadinejad")
          :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                     :ARG1 (c / country
                             :name (n2 / name
                                     :op1 "Iran"))
                     :ARG2 (p2 / president)))
  :ARG1 (e / expand-01
          :ARG0 c
          :ARG1 (a / arsenal
                  :consist-of (c3 / centrifuge
                                :ARG0-of (p3 / produce-01
                                           :ARG1 (u / uranium
                                                   :ARG1-of (e2 / enrich-01))))
                  :poss c)
          :ARG4 (o / over
                  :quant 5000))
  :ARG2 (s2 / scholar)
  :location (c2 / city
              :name (n3 / name
                      :op1 "Mashbad")
              :mod (n4 / northeast))
  :time (d / date-entity
          :year 2008
          :month 7
          :day 26))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030.7 ::date 2013-08-09T19:50:29 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030_7.txt
(a / assert-03
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Ahmadinejad"))
      :ARG1 (e / expand-01)
      :ord (o / ordinal-entity :value 1
            :range (s2 / since
                  :op1 (a2 / announce-01
                        :ARG1 (a3 / approach-01
                              :ARG1 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran"))
                              :ARG2 (i / implement-01
                                    :ARG0 c
                                    :ARG1 (c2 / centrifuge :quant 6000)))
                        :time (d / date-entity :month 4 :year 2008))))
      :ARG1-of (s / state-01))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030.8 ::date 2013-08-01T17:54:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

  :ARG0 (c / country
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Iran"))
  :ARG1 (g / goal
          :mod (c2 / centrifuge
                 :quant 50000
                 :ARG1-of (o / operate-01
                            :location (p / plant
                                        :ARG0-of (e / enrich-01)
                                        :location (n3 / near
                                                    :op1 (t / town
                                                           :name (n2 / name
                                                                   :op1 "Natanz"))))))))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030.9 ::date 2013-08-01T18:51:53 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Thu Aug 1, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030_9.txt
(d / demand-01
  :ARG0 (c / community
          :mod (i / international))
  :ARG1 (h / halt-01
          :ARG0 (c2 / country
                  :name (n / name
                          :op1 "Iran"))
          :ARG1 (p / produce-01
                  :ARG1 (m / material
                          :mod (n2 / nucleus)))))

                     :ARG0 (m / media)))

          :quant-of (c2 / centrifuge)

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030.11 ::date 2013-08-01T19:00:34 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt An Iranian news agency reported that ahmadinejad stated Iran had 6000 working centrifuges but the agency subsequently removed the statement from the Internet.
# ::save-date Thu Aug 29, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030_11.txt
(r / report-01
  :ARG0 (a / agency
          :mod (n / news)
          :mod (c / country
                 :name (n2 / name
                         :op1 "Iran")))
  :ARG1 (s / state-01
          :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                          :op1 "Ahmadinejad"))
          :ARG1 (h / have-03
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (c2 / centrifuge
                          :quant 6000
                          :ARG0-of (w / work-09))))
  :concession-of (r2 / remove-01
                   :ARG0 a
                   :ARG1 s
                   :ARG2 (i / internet)
                   :time (s2 / subsequent)))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030.12 ::date 2013-08-01T19:07:52 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                           :op1 100000))))

                             :ARG0 (p / person

  :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
             :ARG0 (a / absent-01
                     :ARG1 (i / information

                                      :poss (c3 / centrifuge))))))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030.14 ::date 2013-08-01T19:59:07 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt A Western diplomat in Tehran speaking under condition of anonymity stated that the quantity of centrifuges is less important than whether the machines are operational and efficient but that ahmadinejad's assertion will hinder a resolution of the diplomatic standoff between Iran and the West.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030_14.txt
(s / state-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person
            :mod (w / world-region :name (n / name :op1 "West"))
            :ARG0-of (s2 / speak-01
                  :ARG1-of (c / condition-01
                        :ARG2 (a / anonymity)))
            :location (c2 / city :name (n2 / name :op1 "Tehran"))
            :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG2 (d / diplomat)))
      :ARG1 (i / important
            :degree (l / less)
            :compared-to (a2 / and
                  :op1 (o / operate-01 :mode interrogative
                        :ARG1 (m / machine))
                  :op2 (e / efficient-41 :mode interrogative
                        :ARG1 m))
            :concession-of (h / hinder-01
                  :ARG0 (t / thing
                        :ARG1-of (a3 / assert-03
                              :ARG0 (p / person :name (n3 / name :op1 "Ahmadinejad"))))
                  :ARG1 (r / resolution
                        :poss (s3 / standoff
                              :mod (d2 / diplomacy)
                              :mod (b / between
                                    :op1 (c4 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Iran"))
                                    :op2 w))))
            :domain (q / quantity
                  :quant-of (c3 / centrifuge))))

                              :ARG1 (a / arm-01)))))
      :ARG1 (r / realize-01
            :ARG0 t

                  :mod (a2 / assemble-01
                        :ARG0 (c2 / country :name (n4 / name :op1 "Iran"))

                 :name (n3 / name
                         :op1 "Europe"))

                 :ARG1-of (e / expert-41
                            :ARG2 (c4 / control-01
                                    :ARG1 (a2 / arm-01)))
                 :mod (w / world-region
                        :name (n4 / name
                                :op1 "West"))
                 :quant (m / majority)))

          :ARG0 (c5 / country
                  :name (n5 / name
                          :op1 "Iran"))
          :ARG1 (c6 / capable-41
                  :ARG1 c5
                  :ARG2 (p3 / produce-01
                          :ARG1 (b2 / bomb-01)
                          :condition (d / decide-01)))))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030.23 ::date 2013-08-02T20:20:44 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030_23.txt

      :time-of (a / and
            :op1 (a2 / add-02 :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Iran"))

            :op2 (r / refrain-01

                        :ARG0 w2
                        :ARG1 (r2 / round
                              :mod (s / sanction-02
                                    :ARG1 c
                                    :mod (e / economy))
                              :ord (o2 / ordinal-entity :value 4))
                        :ARG2 (o / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "UN" :op2 "Security" :op3 "Council")))))
      :time (p3 / pre-negotiate-01)
      :mod (f / freeze-for-freeze)
      :duration (t / temporal-quantity :quant 6
            :unit (w / week)))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030.24 ::date 2013-08-02T20:36:35 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

  :ARG0 (p6 / person

                     :ARG1 (c / country
                             :name (n / name
                                     :op1 "US"))
                     :ARG2 (o / official)))

                                                      :mod (p4 / possible)))))))
  :concession-of (a3 / and
                   :op1 (a / agree-01
                          :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                                  :mod (p2 / person
                                         :name (n4 / name
                                                 :op1 "Bush"))
                                  :ARG0-of (a2 / administrate-01))
                          :ARG1 (t / thing
                                  :mod (f / freeze-for-freeze)
                                  :ARG1-of (p3 / propose-01))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030.27 ::date 2013-08-04T08:05:53 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Solana, burns and European envoys set a deadline for Iran to respond positively before initiating new sanctions including prohibitions on selling Iran refined petroleum products vital to the country's economy.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 3, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030_27.txt
(s / set-01
  :ARG0 (a / and
          :op1 (p / person
                 :name (n / name
                         :op1 "Solana"))
          :op2 (p2 / person
                 :name (n2 / name
                         :op1 "Burns"))
          :op3 (e / envoy
                 :mod (c / continent
                        :name (n3 / name
                                :op1 "Europe"))))
  :ARG1 (d / deadline
          :prep-for (r / respond-01
                      :ARG0 (c2 / country
                              :name (n4 / name
                                      :op1 "Iran"))
                      :ARG2 (p3 / positive)))
  :time (b / before
          :op1 (i / initiate-01
                 :ARG0 a
                 :ARG1 (s2 / sanction-02
                         :mod (n5 / new)
                         :ARG2-of (i2 / include-01
                                    :ARG1 (p4 / prohibit-01
                                            :ARG1 (s3 / sell-01
                                                    :ARG1 (p5 / product
                                                            :mod (p6 / petroleum
                                                                   :ARG1-of (r2 / refine-01))
                                                            :mod (v / vital
                                                                   :prep-to (e2 / economy
                                                                              :poss c2)))
                                                    :ARG2 c2)))))))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030.29 ::date 2013-08-04T08:31:31 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

  :ARG1 (s / suggest-01
          :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                          :op1 "Ahmadinejad"))

                  :domain (h / halt-01

                                            :op1 "Iran"))
                            :ARG1 (e / expand-01)
                            :prep-at (n3 / number
                                       :quant-of (c2 / centrifuge)
                                       :mod (h2 / high
                                              :degree (m / more)
                                              :compared-to (n4 / number
                                                             :ARG1-of (e2 / expect-01
                                                                        :time (p3 / previous)))))

                                        :op1 (t / temporal-quantity

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030.30 ::date 2013-08-04T20:53:01 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Ahmadinejad stated that the West had consented to the existing 5000-6000 centrifuges in operation provided that the number did not increase.
# ::save-date Fri Aug 30, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030_30.txt
(s / state-01
  :ARG0 (p / person
          :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Ahmadinejad"))
  :ARG1 (c / consent-01
          :ARG0 (w / world-region
                  :name (n2 / name
                          :op1 "West"))
          :ARG1 (c3 / centrifuge
                  :ARG1-of (e / exist-01)
                  :ARG1-of (o / operate-01)
                  :quant (b / between
                           :op1 5000
                           :op2 6000))
          :condition (i / increase-01
                       :ARG0 (n3 / number
                               :quant-of c3)
                       :polarity -)))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030.31 ::date 2013-08-04T21:01:45 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 5000 centrifuges can produce sufficient nuclear material for a power plant or an atomic bomb if the material is highly enriched.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 3, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030_31.txt
(p / possible
  :domain (p2 / produce-01
            :ARG0 (c / centrifuge
                    :quant 5000)
            :ARG1 (m / material
                    :ARG0-of (s / suffice-01
                               :ARG1 (o / or
                                       :op1 (p3 / plant
                                              :mod (p4 / power))
                                       :op2 (b / bomb
                                              :mod (a / atom))))
                    :mod (n / nucleus)))
  :condition (e / enrich-01
               :ARG1 m
               :degree (h / high)))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030.32 ::date 2013-08-04T21:06:18 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt 6000 centrifuges running continuously can produce sufficient weapons-grade uranium for 1 bomb in 6 months.
# ::save-date Fri Aug 30, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20080727_0030_32.txt
(p / possible
  :domain (p2 / produce-01
            :ARG0 (c / centrifuge
                    :quant 6000
                    :ARG0-of (r / run-01
                               :ARG1-of (c2 / continue-01)))
            :ARG1 (u / uranium
                    :ARG0-of (s / suffice-01
                               :ARG1 (b / bomb
                                       :quant 1
                                       :duration (t / temporal-quantity
                                                   :quant 6
                                                   :unit (m / month))))
                    :mod (w2 / weapons-grade))))

                                                      :mod c2))))

          :polarity -))

# ::id PROXY_LTW_ENG_20081115_0076.22 ::date 2013-08-08T18:03:06 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Wed Sep 4, 2013 ::file PROXY_LTW_ENG_20081115_0076_22.txt
(s / suspect-01
  :ARG0 (a / and
          :op1 (c / country
                 :name (n / name
                         :op1 "United"
                         :op2 "States"))
          :op2 (c4 / country
                 :ARG1-of (a2 / ally-01
                            :ARG2 c)
                 :location (w / world-region
                             :name (n2 / name
                                     :op1 "West"))))
  :ARG1 (p3 / precede-01
          :ARG0 (e / effort
                  :poss (c2 / country
                          :name (n3 / name
                                  :op1 "Iran"))
                  :purpose (p / produce-01
                             :ARG0 c2))
          :ARG1 (c3 / create-01
                  :ARG0 c2

                          :mod (w2 / weapon
                                 :mod (n4 / nucleus))))))

                  :mod (c3 / cyber)

                  :ARG1-of (s / sustain-01))

      :ARG0 (p / publication :name (n / name :op1 "News" :op2 "Agency" :op3 "Fars")
            :mod (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Iran")))
      :ARG1 (o / or
            :op1 (d / deface-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / hack-04)
                        :ARG1-of (k / know-01
                              :ARG2 (g / group :name (n3 / name :op1 "XP"))))
                  :ARG1 (w / website
                        :ARG1-of (r / relate-01
                              :ARG2 (r2 / religious-group :name (n4 / name :op1 "Shiite")))
                        :quant (m / multiple :op1 100)))
            :op1 (b / block-01
                  :ARG0 p2
                  :ARG1 w)))

      :ARG1 (w / website
            :mod (o / official)

                  :poss (c / country :name (n3 / name :op1 "Iraq"))))
      :ARG2 (w2 / website
            :ARG1-of (d / deface-01)
            :ARG1-of (b / block-01)))

            :mod (u / url-entity :value "www.al-shia.com")

            :mod (u / url-entity :value "www.sistani.com")
            :mod (a2 / alternative))
      :mod (s / still))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209.19 ::date 2013-08-05T14:03:04 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

(a / and
      :op1 (m / mean-01
            :ARG0 (r / religious-group :name (n / name :op1 "Rafidha"))

                  :ARG2 (d / describe-01
                        :ARG0 e
                        :ARG1 (r4 / religious-group :name (n3 / name :op1 "Shiite"))))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20080919_0209.22 ::date 2013-08-06T09:54:56 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

                          :op1 "Bill"
                          :op2 "Maher")

                         :name (n3 / name
                                 :op1 "United"
                                 :op2 "States")))

                     :ARG1 (f / fatwa
                             :source (p2 / person
                                       :name (n4 / name
                                               :op1 "Al-Sistani"))

                                              :ARG1-of (m / marry-01))
                                      :mode interrogative))))
  :mod (a / also))

            :ARG1 (w / wrongdoing
                  :mod (a2 / any))))

                  :quant (m / much
                        :mod (s2 / so)))
            :time (y / year
                  :mod (r / recent))
            :ARG0-of (c2 / cause-01
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (c3 / cut-05
                              :ARG0 (c4 / criminal-organization :name (n4 / name :op1 "Taliban"))
                              :ARG1 (c5 / cultivate-01
                                    :ARG1 (p4 / poppy)))
                        :op2 (s3 / stockpile-01
                              :ARG0 c4
                              :ARG1 (o3 / opium
                                    :mod (r2 / raw)))
                        :purpose (e / effort
                              :purpose (a2 / and
                                    :op1 (s4 / support-01
                                          :ARG0 c4
                                          :ARG1 (t / thing
                                                :ARG2-of (p5 / price-01)))
                                    :op2 (p6 / preserve-01
                                          :ARG0 c4
                                          :ARG1 (s5 / source-02
                                                :ARG1 (f / finance-01
                                                      :ARG1 (i / insurgency))
                                                :mod (m2 / major)))))))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20081128_0005.9 ::date 2013-08-07T04:14:45 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred

# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20081128_0005_9.txt
(f / find-01
      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations"))

            :ARG1 (r / reduce-01
                  :ARG1 (a2 / amount
                        :quant-of (l / land
                              :ARG1-of (d / devote-01
                                    :ARG2 (o2 / opium)
                                    :location (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan")))))
                  :ARG2 (p3 / percentage-entity :value 19)
                  :concession (d2 / drop-01
                        :ARG1 (t / tonnage
                              :quant-of (o3 / opium
                                    :ARG1-of (p5 / produce-01))
                              :mod (t2 / total))
                        :ARG2 (p4 / percentage-entity :value 6
                              :mod (j / just))))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20081128_0005.18 ::date 2013-08-11T01:40:20 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-18 ::preferred

(a / add-01
      :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Costa"))
      :ARG1 (h / hold-01
            :ARG0 (i / insurgent)
            :ARG1 (o / opium
                  :ARG1-of (h3 / have-quant-91
                        :ARG2 (a2 / amount
                              :mod (s / significant))))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20081128_0005.19 ::date 2013-08-11T01:45:34 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Costa said the surplus is as much as 11000 tons, or more than twice world demand in the last 3 years and threatened to devalue their stockpiles.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20081128_0005_19.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Costa"))
            :ARG1 (s3 / surplus
                  :quant (a2 / as-much-as
                        :op1 (m / mass-quantity :quant 11000
                              :unit (t / ton)
                              :mod (m2 / much))
                        :ARG0-of (m3 / mean-01
                              :ARG1 (e / equal-01
                                    :ARG1 m
                                    :ARG2 (m4 / more-than
                                          :op1 (p2 / product-of :op1 2
                                                :op2 (d2 / demand-01
                                                      :ARG0 (w / world)
                                                      :duration (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 3
                                                            :unit (y / year)
                                                            :mod (l / last))))))))))
      :op2 (t3 / threaten-01
            :ARG0 p
            :ARG1 (d / devalue-01
                  :ARG1 (s2 / stockpile
                        :poss (t4 / they)))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20081128_0005.20 ::date 2013-08-11T01:49:34 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-18 ::preferred
# ::snt The United Nations found that Afghanistan produced 8500 tons of opium in 2008.
# ::save-date Sun Aug 11, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20081128_0005_20.txt
(f / find-01
      :ARG0 (o / organization :name (n / name :op1 "United" :op2 "Nations"))
      :ARG1 (p / produce-01
            :ARG0 (c / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
            :ARG1 (m / mass-quantity :quant 8500
                  :quant-of (o2 / opium)
                  :unit (t2 / ton))
            :time (d2 / date-entity :year 2008)))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20081128_0005.21 ::date 2013-08-11T01:53:16 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt World demand was estimated at about 4400 tons per year.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20081128_0005_21.txt
(e / estimate-01
      :ARG1 (d / demand-01
            :ARG0 (w2 / world))
      :ARG2 (r / rate-entity-91
            :ARG1 (a2 / about
                  :op1 (m / mass-quantity :quant 4400
                        :unit (t2 / ton)))
            :ARG2 (t / temporal-quantity :quant 1
                  :unit (y / year))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20081128_0005.22 ::date 2013-08-11T01:55:48 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt The Taliban this year are taking a passive stance toward cultivation and putting less pressure on Afghan farmers to plant opium poppy.
# ::save-date Fri Sep 20, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20081128_0005_22.txt
(a / and
      :op1 (t / take-01
            :ARG0 (c / criminal-organization :name (n / name :op1 "Taliban"))
            :ARG1 (s / stance
                  :mod (p / passive)
                  :prep-toward (c2 / cultivate-01))
            :time (y / year
                  :mod (t2 / this)))
      :op2 (p6 / put-01
            :ARG1 (p2 / pressure-01
                  :ARG0 c
                  :ARG1 (p5 / person
                        :mod (c3 / country :name (n2 / name :op1 "Afghanistan"))
                        :ARG0-of (f / farm-01))
                  :ARG2 (p3 / plant-01
                        :ARG1 (p4 / poppy
                              :mod (o / opium)))
                  :mod (l / less))))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20081128_0005.23 ::date 2013-08-11T02:03:07 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt This then supports the current price.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20081128_0005_23.txt
(s / support-01
      :ARG0 (t / this)
      :ARG1 (t3 / thing
            :ARG2-of (p / price-01)
            :mod (c / current))
      :mod (t2 / then))

# ::id PROXY_NYT_ENG_20081128_0005.24 ::date 2013-08-11T02:04:14 ::snt-type body ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred
# ::snt Costa is an Italian diplomat who has served at the U.N. Office on Drugs and Crime for 6 years.
# ::save-date Tue Sep 17, 2013 ::file PROXY_NYT_ENG_20081128_0005_24.txt
(p / person :name (n2 / name :op1 "Costa")
      :ARG0-of (s / serve-01
            :ARG2 (o / organization :name (n3 / name :op1 "U.N." :op2 "Office" :op3 "on" :op4 "Drugs" :op5 "and" :op6 "Crime"))
            :duration (t2 / temporal-quantity :quant 6
                  :unit (y2 / year)))
      :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
            :ARG1 (c / country :name (n / name :op1 "Italy"))
            :ARG2 (d / diplomat)))
